21b9(mdo): da ltar sangs pa yin no// gsol pa/ 'jam dpal dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa ji lta bu zhig lags// spras pa/ chos thams cad dran pa myed/ yid la byed pa myed pa'o// gso lang
22a1(mdo): pa/ 'jam dpal gang na dran pa myed/ yid la byed pa myed pa der gnas te/ da ltar langs pa lakas sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gnas pa gapa la gnas na/ byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye
22a2(mdo): bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rgyu bar 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de la gnas te/ bdag da ltar langs pa ma yin no// lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsold pa/ 'jam dpal kang
22a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyis ma dmyigs pa'i gnas pa de ji lta lags// spamra lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dmyigs pa'o// mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas
22a4(mdo): pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dmyigs pa'o// de nas na kAn sa pa de la gnas te/ da ltar langs pa yin no// gsol/ dad pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa ji lta bu lags
22a5(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang na dran pa myed cing / yid la byed pa de ni kang de ni gnas pa'i dam pa yin te/ kang gnas pa de la gnas pa de dag ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su myi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams
22a6(mdo): su myi gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su myi gnas so// gang khams gsum la myi gnas pa de dag ni mnyam pa'i gnas pa sa gnas pa'o// gang mnyam pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de dag
22a7(mdo): la ni myi mnyam pa myed do// gang la myi mnyam pa myed pa de dag ni 'gro ba myed do// gang la 'gro ba myed pa de dag la ni ma rig pa myi mthong ngo // gang ma rig pa myi mthong ba de dag ni rig pa ma skyes so//
22a8(mdo): gang rig pa ma skyes pa de dag ni myi 'byung ngo // gang myi 'byung ba de dag ni 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// gang myi 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba de dag ni 'jig pa myed do// gang 'jig pa myed pa de dag ni myi 'byung ngo //
22a9(mdo): gang ma byung ba de dag ni dbye bar myi nus so// gang dbye bar myi nus pa de dag ni/ lha'i bu shi na tu dag pa yin te/ lha'i bu de ni 'phags pa gnas pa rtul dang bral ba'o// gsol da pa/ 'jam dpal rdul
22b1(mdo): ces bgyi ba ci lags/ smras pa/ lha'i bu chung ngu na sangs rgyas su dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba ni rdul to// lha'i bu mtshan ma ni rdul to// 'du shes dang / 'dzind pa dang / chags pa dang / rlom ses/
22b2(mdo): dang / 'dud pa dang / khyengs pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / chags sems dang / khong khro ba dang / dmyigs pa dang / 'gro ba dang / smon lam dang / rtog pa dang / rtogs pa'i mtshan ma dang / yongs su rtog
22b3(mdo): pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / pa slong bar byed pa dang / chad par 'dzind pa dang / rtag par 'dzind pa dang / myed par 'dzind pa dang / log par 'dzind pa dang
22b4(mdo): yod par 'dzidad pa dang / myed par 'dzind pa dang / sgo'i bu ji tsam du rnam par rtog cing spros pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mas pa dang / skrun pa de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dus/
22b5(mdo): ba la rdul du bshad do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhun nur gyur/ da pa la/ lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so// legs so// yang
22b6(mdo): 'jam dpal khyod kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa bshad pa 'di legs so zhes smras so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu chog gis ma rtog shig/ khyod ni ma skyes pa ma byung ba ma
22b7(mdo): bstand pa'i chos kyis legs par sbyin par byed de/ lha'i bu ka 'dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la bstand pa 'di bshad pa 'am brjod par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad brjod du myed pa'i phyir te/
22b8(mdo): chos thams cad ni brjod du byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni brjod pa gang yang myed pas/ de'i phyir de dag ni brjod pa'o// lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ 'jam dpal gnas pa
22b9(mdo): kapa la gnas pa byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti muka rnams rgyu bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams
23a1(mdo): cad dngos po myed pa la gnas na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams rgyu bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa de bzhin/
23a2(mdo): nyid la gnas pa'i byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams rgyu bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin
23a3(mdo): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' las bral te bshad myi nus so// gsol pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bkyi ba kang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ smras pa/ sgra'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'
23a4(mdo): zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// gsol pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bdag gi mtha'i tshig bla dgas so
23a5(mdo): gsol pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi mtha' zhes bgyi ba ga/ nga gi tshig bla dgas lags/ smras pa/ 'khor ba'i mtha'i chi// ga bla dgas so// gsol pa/ 'jam dpal 'khor ba'i
23a6(mdo): mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ smras pa nam mkha'i tshig bla dgas yin no// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i dbyings la mtha' ma myed/ chad pa myed/ ring ba myed
23a7(mdo): zung ba myed/ zlum po myed de/ gru bzhi myed/ phra ba myed/ sgom pa myed/ leb leb po myed/ dkar po myed/ nag po myed/ dmar po myed/ gzhan du na na ma mkha' zhes myi ba tsam du grangs su 'gro ste/ myi bde yang
23a8(mdo): gsob yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtha'/ nam mkha'i 'gros/ nam mkha'i mying gi rang bzhin no// skra'i bu 'di ste ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni myi skye/ myirga myi 'chi/ myi
23a9(mdo): 'byung / nyon myi mongs/ rnam par myi dkar/ chags pa myed/ zhe sdang ba myed/ bkur ba myed/ myi bkur ba yang myed do// de'i mthas ni myi bgrang ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad bgrang bar bya'o// lha'i bu gdags
23b1(mdo): su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ni 'du ba dang 'bral bar bstan cing gzhag myi nus so// lha'i bu chos thams cad ni ma btags pa/ ma btul ba/ dam pa ma yin pa ste/ lha'i bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi
23b2(mdo): mnyam pa nyid myi mnyam pa ma yin pa/ de bzhin nyid phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid do// ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu de dag thams cad myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// de dag myi skye ba'i chos la bzod
23b3(mdo): pa thob nas/ chos la gus pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la/ lha'i me tog man dA ra bas gtor nga to// mye tog de dag gtor ma thag tu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa'i byid kyis brlabs kyis
23b4(mdo): steng gi bar snang gnas myed cing yongs su ma btsud bzhin du 'a rug par gyur da to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so// lho'i
23b5(mdo): bu de ji snyam du sems/ mye tog 'di dag gang la gnas/ gso lad pa/ 'jam dpal mye tog 'di dag ni gnas pa ma lag/ sa so// smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang
23b6(mdo): myi gnas pa ste/ myi gnas par nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing ni ma khA las kyang myi 'alba myi ltung myi g.yo rab tu myi g.yo mya bugs rab tu myi 'bugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag thams cad ni ni
23b7(mdo): mkha' dang mtshungs pas/ de'i phyir de dag myi g.yo'i rab tu myi g.yol/ myi 'bugs rab tu myi 'bugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la/ lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces
23b8(mdo): gsol to// 'jam dpal khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'grus kyi cho 'phrul 'thob ste/ khyod sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu myed par 'gro zhing 'ong ba ngom
23b9(mdo): to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu' cho 'phrul thob pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni ma gtogs/
24a1(mdo): shing zad pa myed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thams cad ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu cho 'phrul thob pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sgra'i bu sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub
24a2(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa grangs myed par btsal kyang / chos gang yang thob par ma gyurapa/ ma thob myi thob bo// byis pa lta bu'i so so'i
24a3(mdo): skye bo thams cad kyis ni thob bo// ni thob ce na bdag the bosems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba po dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed pu dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa dang /
24a4(mdo): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug thob bo// gang sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos ma thob pa ma bskyed pa/ de brtse/ da par byed pas na/ lha'i bu de'i phyir byis pa lta bu so so'i skye
24a5(mdo): bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu thob pa yin gyi/ sangs rgyas na/ mas ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma yin/ ra// pa sangs rgyas rnams ma yin/ nyan thos rnams ma yin
24a6(mdo): no// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher bshad nas/ bdag bdag ki sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs so// de nas de bzhin
24a7(mdo): gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ong bar lta shig bya'o snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred
24a8(mdo): kyi rgyal pos/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma de btang ste/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil nas 'od gzer gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ 'od de la ci nas kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog nas yan bdun bsgom
24a9(mdo): 'jam dpal gyi spyi bor nub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin kyis brlabs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu ra pa 'di snyam du gyur da te/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis na/ 'di lta bu'i snang ba bsam gyis myi
24b1(mdo): khyab pa bdag gi lus la phog nas/ spyi bor myi sdang bar 'gyur snyam pa las/ yang de 'di snyam du gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par bzhed do snyam mo// de nas 'ja/
24b2(mdo): dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas/ lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag tshur sheg/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ de bzhin
24b3(mdo): gshegs pa de blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / kun zhu ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // zab mo zab pa chos kyi sgo bsgrub pa dag kyang de na 'chad kyis de dag kyang mnyan pa bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal
24b4(mdo): kazhon dur gyur da pa la lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'dis/ da ces gsol to// 'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par mkhyen dan bzhud do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas
24b5(mdo): sems bskyed pa gcig gis mi 'khor yug gi chen po de nas/ lha/ 'i bu de dag dpabacas te myi sdang bar gyur da nas/ bcom ldan 'a/ dam de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'khod
24b6(mdo): do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum skor nas phyogs gcig
24b7(mdo): tu 'khod do// lha'i bu de dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig
24b8(mdo): tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos
24b9(mdo): sems par dge ba'i rarba ba bskyed par bgyi'o// zab mo la bzod pa la yang the tsom ma mchis par bgyi'o// des bdag kyang snod du gyur par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar glang po
25a1(mdo): chen po dag gi nang nas/ bdag slad rol du byung bar gyur to// chos bshad pa de 'dra ba las kyang slad rol tu byung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo the tsom sel ba 'di ni/ sa'i phyogs
25a2(mdo): 'di las gang dA ma g.yos// kang du yang ma 'phags pas gyurd to// bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba snga dro gcig gis/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed grangs myed par mchi zhing /
25a3(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal ba dang / gang de dag gi chos bshad pa de yang 'dzind cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yongs su zhu yongs su gsol bar bgyid cing / de bzhin gshegs/
25a4(mdo): pa de dag kyang bdag la zhus pa'i lung stond par mdzad de/ bam ldan 'das bdag ni chos bshad pa gang du yang bskrad pa 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs par ma 'tshal te/ sangs
25a5(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi bsamamakhyend nas/ bdag nyid las chos 'chad par bsku'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ri 'khor yug gi rtse mo de la mchis
25a6(mdo): pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas// chos btsal ba dang / chos la bsgom ba dang / chos la bkur sti bapyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang cher 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// yang bdag 'di snyam du
25a7(mdo): gyur da te/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis da bdag 'khor de nas ri khor yug gi ye mo 'dir 'phangs shing / sring mo the tsom sel ba 'di ni ma 'phangs par gyu rang snyam pa las/ bcom ldan 'das yang bdag 'di snyam
25a8(mdo): du gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnams la slob dpon gyis 'chab pa yang myi mdzad/ chags pa'i sems kyang ma mchis na/ de la bdag nyid kho ru chung ngu bas sam/ sred na chos bshad pa 'di la 'a
25a9(mdo): sdod du ma gyur da pa 'di lta ste/ de'i slad du bdag der 'phangs so snyam bgyid do// de ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhun/ tsa'i slad du bdag 'khor 'di nas ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs la/ srid
25b1(mdo): mo 'di ma 'phangs par gyur da ces de skad gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' saHla da to// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas/
25b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bshad pa gang du yang khyod sdod du ma gyur pa ni 'ga' yang myed mod kyi/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyem par dka' ste/ dus thams cad du pha rol
25b3(mdo): kyis/ chos spyod pa la glan gdab par myi nus te/ 'jam dpal khyod thog ma nor 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed kyis byung ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam tu gyurard te de ring kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas
25b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad kyis/ bdag ni der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa blta ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
25b5(mdo): chos bstand pa de dag mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o snyam du gyur da to// 'jam dpal khyod ni spobs pa chen po dang / dmyigs pa chen po dang // rtog pa chen po dang / yongs su rtog pa chen pos sangs rgyas kyi
25b6(mdo): zhing de nas song ste/ sangs rgyas rnams blta'o// chos kyi nga mnyan du 'gro'o// snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal khyod nigs pa kasuM kyis chags shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs
25b7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs so// gsum gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmyigs pa dang / sangs rgyas la dmyigs pa dang / chos su dmyigs pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa la spyod na ma
25b8(mdo): chags pa thob par 'gyur ba myed do// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sus kyang shes pa 'am/ mthong ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yas gzhan pa'i chos gang yang mthong bar nus
25b9(mdo): sam// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnams chos nyid de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang blta bar myi bkyi/ chos la ma lags/ sems can la ma lags so// bcom
26a1(mdo): ldan 'das ka lad te sems can yongs su grub par gyurd tam/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar gyurd tam/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur blta bar bgyi na ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang
26a2(mdo): blta bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pas gzhan yang gzigs par gyur da na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i slad du/ gang de bzhin gshegs par blta ba de la ma mchis so//
26a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas kyang chung zad kyang gzigs pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mthong bar bgyid pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
26a4(mdo): pa/ 'jam dpal myig dang / rna ba gang dang ldan na de bzhin ka sheg/ sa pa'i sku mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstand pa'i chos 'dul ba thos par 'dod pa'i myig dang / rna bcung zad kyang
26a5(mdo): yod dam/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa cang myi smra ba/ ra gyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de na/ byang/ chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur da te/ 'jam dpa
26a6(mdo): gzhon nur gyur da pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas mams na/ tsang mya gsung bar gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pas mas pa'i lan 'debs ma nus so snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal
26a7(mdo): po sems kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa yongs su mkhyend nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' sa sad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de ltar ma sems shig/ khyed 'jam dpas
26a8(mdo): gzhon nur gyur pa la brnyas pa'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas mabams pa/ de'ang 'jas
26a9(mdo): dpal gzhon nur gyur da pA lan thebs pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs pa gang dang tshul gang ki sa na/ rmas pa'i lan thebs pa lags/ bka'
26b1(mdo): saHsad pa/ 'di lta rigs kyi bu dag 'jam dpal 'di ni 'di snyam du sems te/ ka sad te bdag gis bdag la myig mchis so// bdag la rna ba mchis so zhes bshad na ni// rtag par 'gyur/ ga lad te bdag
26b2(mdo): myig ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// zhes bshad na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te/ rtag par dang chad par spyod pas/ chos nyid shes par myi 'gyur te/ chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni chad pa yang myed/ rtag
26b3(mdo): pa yang myed do// gabaran chad pa yang myed/ rtag pa yang myed pa don gyi skye ba'o// gang myi skye ba de ni brjod du myed pa'o zhes de ltar sems shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rmas pa'i lan btab pa
26b4(mdo): 'di yin no// stond pas 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' drug brgya myi skye ba'i chos su bzod pa skyes so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur/
26b5(mdo): pa la 'di skad ces bka' sa yad to// 'jam dpal rgyu'o// di dang rkyen 'di yin te/ de'i phyir khyod mi 'khor yug gi che mor/ 'phangs so// 'jam dpal gang yang ci'i slad du na
26b6(mdo): sring mo the tsom ses pa 'di ma 'phangs par gyurd cig ces khyod de skad zer ba ni/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di zla ba'i 'od kun tu dri ma myed par snang ba zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
26b7(mdo): gzhag ste/ de ni sangs rgyas dag 'dir gshegs sem gshegs zhe'am/ mchod dang myi 'chad cing snyam du myi sems te/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas su 'du shes myed/ chos su 'du shes myed/ dge 'dun du
26b8(mdo): 'du shes myed/ bdag tu 'du shes myed/ gzhan du 'du shes myed de/ 'jam dpal sring mo de ni 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// de ni ting nge 'dzind de la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i
26b9(mdo): sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ka'i klung ga phyi ma rnams kyis chos nyan to// 'dzin to// thos nas kyang gzhan la stond par byed mod kyi/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'din zhing la zhing du 'du shes pa myed/
27a1(mdo): do// sangs rgyas la sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa myed/ chos la chos su 'du shes pa myed/ dge 'dun la dgel 'dun du 'du shes pa myed/ bdag la bdag tu 'du shes pa myed/ gzhan la gzhan
27a2(mdo): du 'du shes pa myed de/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ zla bo'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal myed khang las kyang myi g.yo la/ kun tu yang sdang bar byed de/ thams cad du yang ston mod kyi/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ge pa la yA/
27a3(mdo): nye bar myi byed/ 'di la 'od snang bar bya'o// 'di la myi sdang bar bya'o zhes rtog pa yang myed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du sring mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu byed pa/
27a4(mdo): sems can dpag tu myed pa rnams la sdang bar byed/ sangs rgya sa kyi zhing dpag tu myed par ston par byed/ rnam par rtog pa myed sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par byed cing / sems
27a5(mdo): can thams cad la chos stond te/ 'jam dpal ngas ni bskal da pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du sring mo 'di'i/ yon tan brjod kyang yon tan zad par myi 'gyur te/ 'jam dpa
27a6(mdo): de ltar sring mo 'di yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan no// 'jam dpal kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni/ gang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya
27a7(mdo): stong dag mchis na ci lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'tshogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bdag bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs par gyurd tam/ bcom
27a8(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' ra u gA/ 'jam dpal de skad sa zer cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su ma rtog shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pas ma rtog shig/ de bzhin gshegs
27a9(mdo): pa'i byid kyi brlabs la ma rtog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshogs pas 'di lta ste/ dper da bu
27b1(mdo): ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal bzhin du 'dra bar mang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su khyab par gyur da kyang / kang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ byang chub sems dpal
27b2(mdo): dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / myi dang/ myi ma yin pa gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis thams cad du thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ste/
27b3(mdo): ngagacig pu gnyis su myed par mthong ngo // de dag gi chos bshad pa yang ma thos ste/ nga gcig pu'i thos so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs dang // de bzhin gshegs pa cho khrul dang / de bzhin gshegs
27b4(mdo): mi rdo bar 'phrul ba dang / de bzhin gsheg bI sku pra las stog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su gang ya da/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lha'i myig gis kyang de bzhin
27b5(mdo): gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis ma// thod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// 'ja/ ma dpal byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang /
27b6(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas shing / rgyu ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng
27b7(mdo): ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag ji ltar sems pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de de ltar mang ba sgrib par myi byed/ thogs par myi byed pa la ltos// 'jam dpal rnam grangs 'dis kyang
27b8(mdo): 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin gi/ gzugs yongs su grub pa'i sku ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa myed pa ste/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ma skyes
27b9(mdo): pa ma byung ba ma thos pa rnam par ma shes pa'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni zag pa myed pa rtog pa myed pa/ gzugs myed pa/ bstand tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ rnam par myi
28a1(mdo): dbyigs pa ste/ nam mkha' ni sus kyang blta myi nus so// yang nam mkha' di spyan sngas mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// spyan lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i rgyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / shes/
28a2(mdo): rab kyi phyar dang / chos kyi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan te/ gzhan du na nam mkha' des zhwa zhes kla su 'khro bar zad do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang zag pa myed pa/ gtogs pa myed pa
28a3(mdo): gzugs myed pa/ bstand tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ dmyigs su myed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sus kyang mthong bar myi nus so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sus kyang ma mthong ngo // de bzhi
28a4(mdo): gshegs pa'i sku ni sha'i rgyan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byad kyi bar du/ spyan lnga la snang bar myi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes mying tsam gyi grangs su 'gro ste/ mying de yang gsob bo// 'jam dpal de
28a5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul la ltos/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dag ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/ de dag gzugs kyi sku'i 'dog/ yongs su rdzogs pa yang stond to// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
28a6(mdo): sum bcu ma gnyis dang yang ldan no// 'jam dpal gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag khyod kyi myig gis mthong bar ma gyur da ba de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi byin kyi rlabs dang /
28a7(mdo): mthus de ltar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar gzhi ni khyod yin te/ khyod las brtsams nas/ chos zab mo bstand par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag
28a8(mdo): thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu ngo mtshar che ba'i sgra phyung nas ngo mtshar to// ngo mtsha rad to// de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ mthu che ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dag mang yang / bdag cag gis
28a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong ste/ 'dir su zhig gshegs su zhig bzhud/ su zhig 'chad/ su 'chad ces mtshan ma tsam yang ma 'tshal da to// 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu 'chad
28b1(mdo): par mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gsad te ye shes chen po 'di 'dra ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can re re'i phyir/ bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems
28b2(mdo): can dmyal ba chen por bsgral kyang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzod par bgyi'o// ye shes chen po de 'dra ba yongs su 'dor bar ni myi bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs
28b3(mdo): pA 'brug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'dis ji srid nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na
28b4(mdo): sring mo de 'di 'dra bar zhi ba dang / dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mkhar gzhag pa thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis laka la maH la pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na
28b5(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bskal pa dpag tu/ myed pas bskyed pa ste/ rtag par skyes pa tshad myed par skyes pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang
28b6(mdo): bsam gtan dang / shes rab las skyes pa ni sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das rnams kyi bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin te/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni sun ring po nas pyad pa
28b7(mdo): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ste/ sring mo 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byas pas pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis 'di ting nge 'dzind la slong
28b8(mdo): 5/ yun ji srid nas bapyad ces dris shika dang / sring mo 'di nyid khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// bam po sa ma / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
28b9(mdo): pa/ sring mo de slong bar 'dod nas/ se gol gi sgra tha mal pa byas kyang / sring mo de ting nge 'dzind de las ma yangs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas/ se gol ji lta bus phyogs bcu'i 'jig
29a1(mdo): rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa sgra thos par 'gyur ba/ de 'dra ba'i se gol gi sgra byas kyang / sring mo de ting nge 'dzid de las ma langs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas rdzu 'phrug
29a2(mdo): mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pa ji lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ lha dang myi'i sil snyan thams cad ma dgrol bar sgra 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du
29a3(mdo): byas/ bdag nyid kyang sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong srul nas yid du 'ong ba chags par byed pa/ rnar 'ong ba'i sgra 'byind to// yang de'i tshe na sil snyan gyi sgra gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi zhams mtha
29a4(mdo): yas mu myed pa kun tu grags par 'gyur ba'i sgra shi nad tu chen por 'byung bar 'gyur kyang / sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs te/ ya nga de'i tshe gang phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
29a5(mdo): pa 'tsho ba bzhes pa de dag la bdag bdag gi g.yog gisazhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis na/ sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos pa'i sgra
29a6(mdo): gda' ba 'di 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces ka so lad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ bdag bdag kyi ka yo ga la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// 'jig rten
29a7(mdo): kyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho ba zhes te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sring mo la the tsom sel pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs/
29a8(mdo): pa de'i g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i 'od kun dri ma myed par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad la mnyam par gzhag ste/ de na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa zhes bya ba go cha bsam gyis myi khyab pa bgos pa'i phyir
29a9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' zhig yod de/ sring mo de ting nge 'dzind de las slong bar 'dod nas/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des lha dang myi'i sil snyan gyi sgra byung ste/ de'i byin kyi brlabs kyis
29b1(mdo): sil snyan 'di dag ma bkrol bar sgra 'byind cing 'di lta ste/ sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin de las bslang ba'i phyir/ des sil snya bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag 'phrul te/ rigs kyi bu de dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra
29b2(mdo): 'byung mod kyi/ sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las bslang bar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu rgya de dang rkyed de'i phyir sil snyan gyi sgra chen po 'jig rten du byung ngo // de skad ces bka' maHlad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
29b3(mdo): de dag la g.yog de dag gis 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo de 'di 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhi 'thob cing / 'di 'dra ba'i sil snyan gyi sgras kyi ldang ba po mtshar to// bka' yas la pa/ rigs
29b4(mdo): kyi bu de de bzhin te/ sring mo 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsam kyis myi khyab pa thob pa'o// de nas gtam 'di brjod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu nas sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa dgra na myed pa'i byang/
29b5(mdo): byab tu zhugs par gyur te/ phreng mo de'i lta la ba zhin du bdag cag kyang de dang ba'i ting nge 'dog ni ba thob ba gyur ka/ 'ad pal gzhon nu gyud pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag kyang de 'dra ba le rnam par sprul pa thob par gyur da cig ces de nad kyi tshig smras so// de nas yang 'jas dpas gzhon nur gyur da pas/ u 'dul mngon pa 'du bya ba 'don pa su
29b6(mdo): byed pa ji lta bus/ song gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams da/ nga sun ma rgyal po dang / kangs kyi mi dang / ri ga tang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / ri 'khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / gzhan yang
29b7(mdo): ri rab 'bring tha ma de dag thams cad gcig la gcig 'dus shing / gcig la gcig thug pa dang / gcig la gcig 'thab pa 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs po che/ stobs po che'i zla bol mthu'i shugs zas
29b8(mdo): cad kyis thal mo rdob par byed pa de bzhin du ri chen po dang / ri khor yug chen po de dag gcig la gcig 'dus nas/ ri'i rgyal po de dag 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis pa spu zing zhes byed par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i
29b9(mdo): sgras 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu myed par grag par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bye ba mngon par 'du byas kyang / srang mo de ting nge 'dzind de las bslang ma nus so// de nas 'jam
30a1(mdo): dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa/ sring mo de lag pa gnyis kyis ma reg la byin gyi brlabs kyis lag pa gnyis bzung ste/ bslang bar 'dod nas de de skyon pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
30a2(mdo): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed g.yos/ rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos kyang sring mo de bslang bar ma nus te// chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g.yo bar ma nus/ 'gul par ma nus ting nge 'dzind de las
30a3(mdo): bslang bar yang ma nus nas/ de yang shi nad tu shugs thams cad kyis gdeg go snyam nas shugs phyung ste/ brdeg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams kyan du 'phangs kyang ting nge 'dzind de las
30a4(mdo): ma yangs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas sa gang gi phyogs na/ sring mo de mnyam par gzhog pas de'i phyogs 'o ra khor yug tu drangs te/ lag pa g.yas pa la gzhog go//
30a5(mdo): lag pa g.yas par gzhag nas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phangs kyang sring mo de ting nge 'dzind de las ma langs so// tsha// ngas pa'i 'jig rten las slar yang sa la gzhag kyang ma langs so/
30a6(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pas sring mo de lag pa g.yas par gzhag nas/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du song zhing sil snyan gyi sgra de dag dang / ri'i sgra dbyangs
30a7(mdo): de dag 'byin cing / me tog gi char 'bebs pa bzhin du song yang sring mo de nyid la ni de 'am la yangs so// de bzhin du sgo phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu sring mo de khyer de
30a8(mdo): song nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du bzhag ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
30a9(mdo): pyod pa ni ngo mtshar te/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'tshal pa 'am/ sems par sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ka lad te bdag gis sems ma mchis pa'i dngos po dag smar stsal na'ang
30b1(mdo): smra bar 'gyur ro// sring mo 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i snga rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi sbas bslang bar ma nus te/ bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di dang / gang su 'ang de las gzhan pa bla myed pa yang
30b2(mdo): drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa dang / gang 'jug pa dang / kang de 'dra ba'i ye shes chen po bsgrub par 'gyid pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyid du zhe na/ gang bcom ldan 'das byang chub
30b3(mdo): sems dpa'i pyod pa 'di ni 'dul ba chen po'i spyod pa lags so// sring mo de ting nge 'dzind de las bslang ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas phyogs bcu thams cad du spong bar bgyid pa de'i
30b4(mdo): che/ sems can dpag tu myed pa/ byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o// sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi dge ba'i mam pa yod su grub par gyur to// de skad ces gso med pa dang
30b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces/ bka' saHladra to// de bzhin no// 'jam dpal rdzi
30b6(mdo): skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ go cha ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bde bar shes par myi nus na/ sems
30b7(mdo): can gzhan gyis lta ci smos te/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga'i kha sa gcig tu gyur du/ yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
30b8(mdo): gcig kyang dza'i kha la cig tu gyur da te/ yongs su rtog pa bzung sa/ 'jam dpal de 'dra ba'i rnga chen por gyur dan/ de na skyes bu de 'dra bar stobs che zhing de 'dra bar mthu che ba de lta bu'i lus dang ldan pas/ stong
30b9(mdo): gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa'i dbyug gu thogs te/ sring mo de'i mdAn du bskal pa 'am/ bskal po'i lhag ma lus kyi bar dU rnga chen po de brdungs su zin kyang / sgra de sring mo de'i rnar grag par
31a1(mdo): myi 'gyur na/ ting nge 'dzind la bslang ba lta ci smos te// de ni gnas myed de sring mo de ni de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzind zhi ba thob bo// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srid
31a2(mdo): mo 'di ting nge 'dzind 'di las slong bar su zhig gis nus/ bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ma gtogs par gzhan
31a3(mdo): sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong bar mi nus pa myed do// de nas rigs kyi bu de'i mying brjod ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas bcom
31a4(mdo): ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i g.yog/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa de la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyend
31a5(mdo): kyis na/ 'jig rten na sa chen po 'di g.yo' bar 'gyur/ bka/ 'astsald pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mying brjod ma thag tu nges par stong gsu
31a6(mdo): kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yo' bar gyur da te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na yang / ka na de bzhin gshegs pa deg rigs kyi bu de'i mying brjod par 'gyur ba/ de'i tshe brjod ma thag tu mchen po rnam
31a7(mdo): pa drug tu g.yo so// de nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mthong bar sgom/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang byang chub sems dpa'
31a8(mdo): dpa' de mthong bar 'dod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su sgom par yang shes/ bdag kyang mthong ba dang / sring mo de ting nge 'dzind de las bslang ba'i phyir
31a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba
31b1(mdo): rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu legs par bstand par gsol// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag kyang rigs kyi bu de mthong bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa de mthong bar 'tshal na/ ci nas kyis skyes
31b2(mdo): bu de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ba ma chi zhing / rigs kyi bu de las mams nas chos zab mo bshad par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba chub sems dpa' 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'gyur zhing / mthong nas kyang de'i rjes
31b3(mdo): su slob pa dang / sring mo de yang ting nge 'dzind de las ldang bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan na legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpal
31b4(mdo): rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyog gang dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ka na rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa lags/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mi lags
31b5(mdo): bka' sacal da pa// rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
31b6(mdo): zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang / ngang pa dang bal glang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/ 'tsho ka zhes shing chos kyang ston te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
31b7(mdo): pasams cadan par ses pa zhes bya ba de da ltar gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos de'i tshe/ de ltar 'dad la bzhugs bzhin du zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe' bo las/ byang chub sems dpa' bskul
31b8(mdo): bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu btang ngo // 'od de btang ma thag tu 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa brtol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
31b9(mdo): rnab par sel pa'i lus la phog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la lan gsum skor ngas kyi bor gyi sdang bar song ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis na/ gang gi phyir
32a1(mdo): de ltar 'od dpa' bdag la lan bdun bsgom dam rgya khor gyi sdang bar song snyam chu bsams pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par 'azhed do/
32a2(mdo): snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa seng ge dang / ngang pa dang / bal klang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
32a3(mdo): de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni steng gi phyogs su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sbed kyi rgyal po lta bar 'tshal lo// / bka' stsal/
32a4(mdo): pa/ de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang / ngang pa dang / ba laH/ nga ki phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa de'i g.yog don thams cad grub
32a5(mdo): pa zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gso lad to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'jug sred kyi rgyal po mtho nga bar 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas ngang pa dang
32a6(mdo): seng ge dang / ban gleng gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pas/ de'i tshe skyi na mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung ngo // 'od phyung ba des steng kyi phyogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam
32a7(mdo): bas brtol nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya bar snang bar 'gyur te/ de nyid du byung bzhin tu snang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' mang pos bskor cing 'dzam bu'i
32a8(mdo): chu bo'i gser gyi ri bzhin du chos 'chad de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dom gangapa tsam na skyes bu myig dang ldan pa gcig gis skyes bu gcig gi bzhin la rtog pa de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
32a9(mdo): pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum dang / sems cag skyed
32b1(mdo): pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas kyi sdang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya bar gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ spyan sngar 'dug go//
32b2(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang bcas te lus snang bar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
32b3(mdo): lan gsum bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang la gnas shing lus thams cad sun 'byin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la mnyam par gzhag ko// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas
32b4(mdo): ji lta bu'i ltas kyis steng gi bar snang las/ lho'i mA tog gi char 'a bab pa dang / me tog de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la 'bab cing / me tog de dag
32b5(mdo): las seng ge dang / ngang pa dang / ban glang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags/ pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyung ba ma ma chis sam/ 'o ma rgyal tam/ bzhengs pa yang ngam/ so
32b6(mdo): bzhin nam/ mthu' mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sa ma zhes gsung ngo zhes zer ba de 'dra ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lngas mdzad do// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad
32b7(mdo): ngo mtshar thob par gyur da nas bcom ldan 'das gang me tog 'di 'dra ba dag dang / sgra 'di 'dra ba yid du mchi ba sgrogs par bgyid pa su'i mthu' lags shes de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so// de nas de bzhin
32b8(mdo): gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang me tog 'di dag gi cher 'bab pa dang / me tog de dag las 'di 'dra ba'i sgra yid du mchi/
32b9(mdo): ba 'byung ba su'i mthu lags/ bka' ya la da pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'i mthu yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
33a1(mdo): thams cad rnam par seld pa de gang na mchis/ bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga
33a2(mdo): 'bum dang 'grogs nas nga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la lus thams cad sun 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la mnyam par gzhog ko// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
33a3(mdo): de dag myi kada'o// bka' sacal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par se lad pa'i mthus myi snang ngo // skyes bu dam pa sgrib pa thams cad/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa 'di
33a4(mdo): snyam du gyur da te/ bdag kyang lus thams cad sun 'byi nad pa 'i ting nge 'dzin da la mnyam par gzhag go// bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzind de la mnyam par ste/ skyes bu dam pa sgrib pa
33a5(mdo): thams cad rnam par sel pa de dang / byang chub sems dang// 'de dag yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang // chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pa
33a6(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa'i sems kyi rnam par rtog/ pa sems kyis shes nas bar sdang la lus myi snang bar byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
33a7(mdo): 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ lus thams cad sun 'byidad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba gcig pu'o// snyam du khyod de lta ma lta shikA/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal rgya mtsho 'ching rnams chen po na chu'i lung
33a8(mdo): bo ci tsam yod pa de'i chu'i thigs pa ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzind ya nga mnyam par gzhog par yang byed/ sdang bar yang byed de/ khyod ni de dag gi mying tsam yang myi shes so//
33a9(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa 'di snyam du gyur da te/ ka lad te bdag gis ting nge 'dzind de a bsgrubs na/ bdag gis sngar sbyangs pa dag don myad do snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas
33b1(mdo): de'i tshe ji lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyis/ se kol gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i batshon 'grus 'phams so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka'/
33b2(mdo): saHla pa/ rigs kyi bu de ga ting nge 'dzin da gang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du'ang grub par 'gyur ba de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas se gol gcig gis bsgrubs so// lhag pa'i
33b3(mdo): bsam pa'i sbyangs pa'i khyad par la ltos// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag skyes bu dam pa
33b4(mdo): de rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'tshal na bstan par gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' sacal da pa/ 'khor 'di dag khyod mthong bar 'dod
33b5(mdo): kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag gi lus ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bar sdang de las babs te slar yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
33b6(mdo): la mgo' bos phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag da pa 'grogs te/ lus myi sdang bar byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nga mthong ngam/ 'jam
33b7(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ ngas ma mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' sachal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag dang / 'khor 'di
33b8(mdo): khyod kyis yus mthong bar 'dod kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag gi lus ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum de dag dang 'grogs te
33b9(mdo): gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs par bdag gi lus ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sring mo 'di
34a1(mdo): ting nge 'dzind 'di las slongs shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzind las slong shig ces de skad smras pa/ ci 'di mying bslang bar bya ba 'am/ 'on te gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba
34a2(mdo): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bslang bar bya// 'jam dpal gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni mnyam par myi gzhog go// tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang
34a3(mdo): bzhin ni mnyam par yang myi gzhog/ sdang bar yang myi byed do// 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni mnyam par yang myi 'jog/ ldang bar yang myi byed na/ chos de gang zhig bslang bar bya/ 'jam
34a4(mdo): dpal ka lad te sring mo 'di mnyam par gzhog par gyur da na ni/ de'i phyir bslang bar bya na/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'dis ni cung zad kyang mnyam par gzhag pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams
34a5(mdo): cad ni gso' zhing byed pa myed pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin ka/ shegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib/ pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' ya cayad pa/ rigs kyi
34a6(mdo): bu khyod kyis sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong zhig/ koso la pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gyi brtol bgyid pa'i rdo myi thog ste/ bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyis dge ba ni bcab par gyis shig ces
34a7(mdo): bka' bams pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sring mo 'di bslang bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las bslang ba'i rngo yang kyi thog yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
34a8(mdo): chos thams cad shes pa dang ston pa la mkhas pa lags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sring mo 'di bslang bar gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ ting nge 'dzind kyi seMs
34a9(mdo): las ldang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam par gzhag ma thog tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
34b1(mdo): dri za dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lngas par gyur da to// sring mo de yang ting nge 'dzind de las langs par gyur da te/ langs nas sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yo' bar byas
34b2(mdo): te/ steng gi bar snang la 'dug go// yang de'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyu rad to// de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang la 'dug pas me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri kas de bzhin
34b3(mdo): gshegs pa'i sku la gtor to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas/ sring mo the tsom sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ngo mtshar to// smras pa/ 'jam
34b4(mdo): dpal de skad ma gsung rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig/ bdag ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob pa ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni ma thob pas skyed pa'o// 'dzad pal
34b5(mdo): gang na thob pa yod pa de na ni dmyigs pa yang yod do// 'jam/ dpal chos thams cad ni zhi ba rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba ste/ zhi ba ni zhi bar myi bya'o// zhi ba ni mnyam par yang myi gzhog/ ldang
34b6(mdo): bar yang myi byed do// smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin mod kyi/ 'od kyang khyod ni ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po thos pa ste/ khyod ni sil snyan gyi sgra chen po phyung bas kyang langs par
34b7(mdo): ma gyurd to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci chos kyi dbyings la mnyam par gzhog pa 'am/ ldang ba mchis sam/ smras pa/ sring mo de ni ma lags so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci gang mnyam par ma gzhag pa
34b8(mdo): de bslang bar nus sam/ spras pa/ de ma lags so// spras pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag la kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / mtshan ma mchis pa de dag mnyam par gzhog gi/ kapa la kha dog
34b9(mdo): ma mchis/ mtshan ma mchis dbyibs ma mchis/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa de dag king du mnyam par gzhog ste/ 'jam dpal de dag ni rang bzhin gyis dus thams cad du mnyam par bzhag gi/ de dag ni slar
35a1(mdo): mnyam par myi gzhog/ ldang bar byed do// de bas na 'jam dpal gson cig/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ lha dang / myi'i sil snyan thams cad bkrol na/ ci yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngam
35a2(mdo): smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin no// 'jam dpal ci nam mkho'i khams ni sil snyan 'di dag las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo snyam du 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ sring mo de ma lags so// 'jam dpal de bas na 'di
35a3(mdo): la chos thams cad nam mazha' dang mtshungs na/ 'di la su zhig sgra thos par 'gyur ram/ gang la cang myi smra bar gyur da/ smras pa/ sring mo gang gis sgra thos par 'gyur ba'i rna ba khyod la myed nas/ de nas sring mo de
35a4(mdo): cad myi smra bar gyur da nasasmras pa sring mo ci'i phyir cang myi smra bar gyur da/ smras pa/ ci'i phyir smras pa/ rna ba myi dmyigs pa 'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sring mo the tsom sel ba des 'jam
35a5(mdo): dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'ja// ma dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dag/ g.yol bar gyurd kyang / rlung ni sus kyang bltar myi nus la/
35a6(mdo): de yang rnam par myi rtog/ de dag kyang rnam par myi rtog ste rlu pa yang bdag gis shing dag bskul bar bya'o snyam du de ltar myi sems so// shing dag bdag cag ni rlung dag gis bskul to snyam du ma
35a7(mdo): sems so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad pa yang bdag ni mnyam bzhog go// sdang bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so//
35a8(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo bar snang de las 'obs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i margyan sngar 'dug la shod cig/ sring mo des smras
35a9(mdo): pa 'jam dpal bdag gi spyod yul du mchis kyi/ bdag la gzhan gyi pyod yul du myi 'tshal lo// smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyi bdag pyod yul gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha' dbyings ni sems
35b1(mdo): can thams can gyi pyod yul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ sems can spyod pa de ci tsam pa de thams cad ni nam mkha' la pyod do// de bas na nam mkha' ni
35b2(mdo): sems can thams cad khyod yul te/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i phyag rgya 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang las babs nas/ phyogs gcig tu pad mo 'jug gi/ de bzhin gshes
35b3(mdo): pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag kyang myi 'tshal/ tshig kyang kyi sgra no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur da pas// sring mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo gang khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag gyi 'tshal bar 'dug
35b4(mdo): ste/ gus pa ma yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin/ 'jam dpal bdag ni gus pa ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar mi nas kyang byed pa yang byed/ myi byed pa yang myed pa
35b5(mdo): ltar bdaka ma gus mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la phyan/ bkyi la nus sam/ smras pa/ de ma lags so// smras pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la yang phyag 'tshal bar myi nus so// de
35b6(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dang / de bzhin nyid de na gnyis su byed de/ gnyis lta bur dbyer myed pa'i phyir ro// yang smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
35b7(mdo): ngam/ smras pa// mthong ngo // smras pa/ ma ster mthong / smras pa/ ji sngar nus tsam yang ma mthong ba de ltar mthong ste/ de 'dra bar mthong ngo // smras pa/ de ltar mthong ba ci zhig mthong // smras pa/ de ltar
35b8(mdo): mthong na srung zad kyang ma mthong ngo // smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang cung zad kyang mthong na/ ci khyod kyig rdul lam/ smras pa/ bdag ni myig tus pa yang ma yin/ myig lnga dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ myig myed pa yang
35b9(mdo): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo myig ni ma skyes pa/ yang dag par ma skyes pa/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i phyir de ni dngos po 'am/ dngos po myed pa kang gis kyang bshad par myi
36a1(mdo): bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci chos thams cad dngos po myed pa 'am/ smras pa/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po myed pa yang ma yin no// smras pa/ 'dza dpal de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhi no// /
36a2(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas/ sring mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir na/ sring mo khyod bud myed kyi lus las bsgyur bar myi byed/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma sma/ rnam par ma rtog shig
36a3(mdo): khyod kyis chos gang yang skyes pa'am/ bud myed du gyurd pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji snyam du sems/ gzugs skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ smras pa
36a4(mdo): ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par zhes pa skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ smras pa ma yi na no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ myig skyes pa 'am/
36a5(mdo): bud myed yin nam/ rna ba dang / snga dang / lce dang / sus dang / yid skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam// smras pa/ ma yaM/ na no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams skyes
36a6(mdo): pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ chu'i khams dang / mye'i kham sa dang / rlung kyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam pa ra shes pa'o khams skyes pa 'am/ bud myed yin nam/ smras
36a7(mdo): pa ma yin no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ yi ge gang dag gis bshad pa'i yi ge dag tu skyes pa 'am/ bud myed du dmyigs sam/ smras pa/ de ma yin no// 'jam dpal 'on/ du 'jam
36a8(mdo): dpal ji ltar na/ sring mo khyod ci'i phyir bud myed kyi lus las bsgyur ba myed ces de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gald te bdag bud myed du dmyigs sam/ skyes par mthong na ni/ bud myed kyi lus de bor te/ skyes pa'i
36a9(mdo): lus blang na/ 'jam dpal bdag ni bud myed du'ang myi dmyigs/ skyes par yang myi mthong na/ de ji ltar na bud myed kyi lus las bsgyur bar bgyi/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung bar yang myi 'gyur/
36b1(mdo): 'jig par yang myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ 'jig par yang myi 'gyur na// de ji ltar na chos thams
36b2(mdo): cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la/ bud myed kyi lus dor zhing skyes pa'i lus blang bar nus par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni blang ba 'am/ myi blang ba'i phyir chos 'chad par myi 'gyur te/
36b3(mdo): yang 'jam dpal myig ni skyes pa ma yin/ bud myed ma yin/ de bzhin du za ba dang / snga dang / lce dang / lus skyes pa ma yin/ zung myed ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ chos gang skyes
36b4(mdo): pa ma yin/ bud myed ma yin pa de ni 'byung ba yang myed/ 'jigapa yang myed do// smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyis ji srid nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ smras pa
36b5(mdo): sgyu ma'i skyes bus ji srid pas rnam par zhes pa'o// smras pa// sgyu ma'i skyes bu yod dam/ smras pa/ de ma yin no// smras/ pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir na/ de skad smra/ khyod ci bzod pa skyes sam
36b6(mdo): smras pa/ de ma yin no// smras pa/ lon ci'i phyir na 'cha par byed/ smras pa/ sgra ma'i skyes bu ji srid nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ de srid nas bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskye
36b7(mdo): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro// yang ji srid nas khyod kyis byang chub du sems bskyed ces smras pa'i 'dri ba 'di ni tshul bzhin ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi skye ba 'dun
36b8(mdo): bskyed par myi nus dkag par myi nus/ kau dgas par myi nus/ gdags par ma nus/ gang dpag tu myed pa'i chos de ni bskyed pa'am/ dgag par myi nus so// sbas pa// tshul bzhin du 'dri ni gang tshul de ni
36b9(mdo): kapa/ smras pa/ myi skye ba ni tshul te/ de 'dra bar 'di 'dra ba ni tshul bzhin du 'dri ba'o// yang sring mo khyod bzod pa skyes sam/ zhes de skad smra ba/ bad ka ni bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/ bzod pa ma skyes
37a1(mdo): pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bzod pa 'i phyi dmyigs pa'i phyir bskyed par yang ma lags/ 'bri ba yang ma lags so// de bas na bdag 'azod pa skyes pa yang ma lags sa bzod pa
37a2(mdo): ma skyes pa yang ma lags so// sring mo byang chub sems dpa' don gang gi dbang mthong na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i
37a3(mdo): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgos par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro// 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
37a4(mdo): rnams kyis kyang / sems can gang yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas ma byon pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar myi 'gyur/ da lta ra bzhugs pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar myi mdzad do/
37a5(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can myed pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ sring mo ci'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal// myi bya/ myi byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// smras
37a6(mdo): ci'i phyir smras pa/ 'di la cung zad kyang bya ba myed do// smras pa sring mo ci'i phyir na rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur/ smras pa/ mtshams myed pa lnga yongs
37a7(mdo): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ sring mo de su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang dag ye shes ma skyes myi 'jig pa'o// smras pa/ de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ smras pa/ kang mos
37a8(mdo): pa'o// sring mo mos pa la yon tan ci yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal mos pa la ni rnam par grol ba'i son tan mchis so// smras pa/ sring mo khyod thogs pa myed pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to//
37a9(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal dmyigs pa la ma spyod cag/ 'jam dpal gang du'ang chags pa yod dam ce na/ de'i phyir bdag khyod ni ma thogs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no zhes smra/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no//
37b1(mdo): de bas de bdag ni thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no// smras pa/ sring mo gang spobs pa zhes bya ba de/ mi la spobs pa zhes bya/ smras ka/ gang dag gis rtogs pa de dag la ni spobs pa yod do//
37b2(mdo): smras pa/ kang du rtogs/ smras pa/ gang du yang ma gtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma gtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o//
37b3(mdo): 'jam dpal yang dgang dag gis ma gtogs pa bdag gis rtogs pa'o// smras pa/ gang du ma rtogs/ spras pa/ khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ste/ gang dag gis khams gsum ma rtogs pa de ni 'od drum chud pas
37b4(mdo): rtogs pa'o// smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyis ji srid na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ spras pa/ gang gi tshe na de bzhi na gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs
37b5(mdo): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par/ rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'jam dpal byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ thob par nus sam
37b6(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa cad kyi smra bar gyur da pa dang sring mo des 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal cad kyi sgra ra bya ba'i dus la ma khab kyis shod cig/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa
37b7(mdo): sring mo byang chub ni bshad du myed na de'i phyir ci bshad ma 'tshal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas/ 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das sring
37b8(mdo): mo 'di ye shes bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa stond par bgyid pa ngo mtshar na bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'dis yun ji srid nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu ses
37b9(mdo): bskyed/ ji srid da byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur 'gyur/ 'di'i mying cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ sring mo 'dis byang chub
38a1(mdo): kyi phyir gyod nas/ sas pa grangs myed pa byed pa khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi phrag dgu bcu sa dgu 'das pa dang / de'i 'og tu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gyis gsol/
38a2(mdo): pa/ sring mo 'dis gang gi drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan gyi lags// bka' sa la da pa/ 'jam dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/
38a3(mdo): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i drung du byangadra chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ki yon tan bkod par gyur da pa de dag/ bskald pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bshad kyang cha tsam yang
38a4(mdo): bshad par myi 'gyur te/ sring mo 'dis ni der byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gsol pa/ tsi bud myed du gyur da pa lags sam/ bka' aN yad pa/ de ni ma yin te/ 'di ni de'o tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i
38a5(mdo): rgyal po sgra dang bral ba zhes bya bar gyur da te/ 'jam dpal sri/ nga mo 'di la ni bud myed ces kyang myi bya/ skyes pa zhes kyang myi bya/ 'o// sring mo 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind thob pa ste/
38a6(mdo): de ci ltar 'dod pa de ltar bdag gi lus sprul par byed do// 2rngam dpal sring mo 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdul dang / yal ka dang / mdab ma ji snyed yod pa
38a7(mdo): de snyed kyi skal pa grangs myed pa brgya phrag stong kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kun tu sdang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs
38a8(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi tshogs chen pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'odi 'dra bar gyur da pa 'di'i/
38a9(mdo): yang de bzhin te/ lhag pa myed/ chad pa myed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom
38b1(mdo): ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni bgyid pa mang ba bgyi ba mang ba ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la yang rnam par rtog par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
38b2(mdo): de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ltar bdag ni byed pa mang ste/ de dag ni chos kyi dbyings myi zad pa'i phyir bde bar zad par myi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam
38b3(mdo): dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces bka' mtshal to// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub kyang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang ma chod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
38b4(mdo): spobs pa 'dri ba dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa na te/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa mnyam par gzhog pa gang la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / ljang
38b5(mdo): bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mnyam par gzhog pa de dag/ gi mying tsam yang khyod kyis myi shes so// de nas 'khor de na/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma bdag 'di snyam du gyur da te/
38b6(mdo): kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam mo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
38b7(mdo): dpa' ded nipas sems kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems shin du tu dul pa zhes bya ba la bka' bcas dpa/ rigs kyi bu stong gsum hU~M sto bachen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can 'i byed
38b8(mdo): pa de dag thams cad 'jam dpas dang 'dra bar myu rab tu zind kyang / sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin kyi mthu dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul pa dang / sregs kyi brgya phrag stong gi char yang myi bod do// ting nge
38b9(mdo): 'dzin gang dag la sring mo 'di mnyam par gzhog pa dang / sdang bar byed pa'i phyi sang 'jam dpas gyis kyi shes so// rigs kyi bu gas te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji da
39a1(mdo): yod pa de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzind kyi mthu dang ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pas the tsom sel ba dang 'dra ba gyur pa tu zin kyang / de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
39a2(mdo): rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ye shes dang / stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgya phrag stong gi char yang myi phod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa gang la mnyam par gzhog cing sdang
39a3(mdo): bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind de dag gi mying tsam yang sring mo 'odas myi shes so// rigs kyi bu ga lad te sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzind dang / ye shes dang / mnyam par gzhog pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
39a4(mdo): pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i gom pa 'dor ba yang myi shes te/ rmongs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gom pa ji ltar 'dor/ ji ltar 'jog
39a5(mdo): myi shes par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye she sa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam kyis myi khyab pa bstand pa 'di stond pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya
39a6(mdo): stong phrag bdun bcu/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bdag cag kyang ye shes dang ldan bar gyur da cig ces de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so// de nas
39a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shi nad tu dul ba la bka' maHla da pa/ rigs kyi bu sring mo 'dis ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa byang chub tu sems du bcug ste/ 'jam dpal
39a8(mdo): gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'/ shar phyogs na gang ga'i klu kyi bye ma yod pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs bcu na yod do// rigs
39a9(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'dis sring mo 'di byang chugu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ sring mo 'di ci lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang ka'i klung kyi bye ma snyed/ rigs
39b1(mdo): kyi bu 'dis ni/ shar phyogs su byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go// phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du yang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu pa nyid da ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
39b2(mdo): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mtho ngam/ rigs kyi bu pa yang 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs la ri rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las byung
39b3(mdo): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ pa ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ phyogs bcur byang chub tu seMs
39b4(mdo): bskyed du bcug ste de dag da ltar bzhugs so// 'tsho zhe zhes so// dpag tu myed pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ tshig de gsungs ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
39b5(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// chos kyi na ma grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der/ byang chub sems dpal khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu ra gnyis
39b6(mdo): myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnam sa kyi rna ba'i dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs grags par gyur da to//
39b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang ma lhag ma chad par kun tu bzung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas srog chags bye ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
39b8(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun bcus ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// dge slong phrag bcu bzhis ni zag pa las ma lus par sems rnam par grol lo/
39b9(mdo): dge slong ma lnga stong dang / lha dang myi'i skyes dgu sems can khrag khrig phrag drug bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de
40a1(mdo): bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' saN+Dal da pa/ ma pham pa khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig/ gzhan la yang rgya cher shod cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
40a2(mdo): 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' aNal pa/ ma pham pa ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ spyod par 'gyur bar khyod la gtad do/
40a3(mdo): ma pham pa ga lad te byang chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa 'tsho ba bzhes po ji snyed pa dang / gang ma 'ongs po'i
40a4(mdo): dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang / spyod par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ sems can thams cad kyang bla na myed pa ya ba dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
40a5(mdo): rgyas shing / stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs// pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag kyang yongs su brtag pa/ bzung na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te slar zhugs
40a6(mdo): par gyur da la/ de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la phyi ma 'i mthar zug gi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur ba stir byas/ ri mor byas/ sti stang byas/ mchod pa byas shing
40a7(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang yun de srid du mchod pa byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ ma pham pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dpe' 'di thos
40a8(mdo): nas sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed/ 'dzin
40a9(mdo): par byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan la yang rgya cher stond par byed cing / chung ngu na thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas kyang shi nad tu bsod nams mdudu 'phel bar 'gyu ro//
40b1(mdo): ma pham pa pad mya ngan las 'das nas/ gang bud byed la la zhig gis sring mo the tsom sel ba de 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dug sred kyi rgyal/
40b2(mdo): po de'i mtshan thos nas// chung ngu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur da te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//
40b3(mdo): tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par yang 'gyur ro// myi khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// skyes
40b4(mdo): bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mngal du gyi gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen skyes bu ngas pa de dag ni bud myed gang dag bdag cag gi myi thos
40b5(mdo): pa de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur dacig ces smon lam 'deb/ sa pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das dges shing de skad bka' sald pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
40b6(mdo): pa pham pa dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar sa pa'i 'jig rten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mchal dpa la mngon par dka'o// sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa
40b7(mdo): chen po'i mdo'o// rdzogs s+ho// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma ha be ri ha ra ka na ma ma ha ya nA su
40b8(mdo): tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
40b9(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal 'gon myed zas byin gyi kun dka' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong
41a1(mdo): mang po dang yang thabs gcig go// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mang po dang yang thabs gcig go// dge slong dang / dge bsnyen ma brgya stong mang po dang yang thabs gcig go//
41a2(mdo): myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skong ba bzhi dag dang yang thabs gcig go// 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i dge slong dang / dge
41a3(mdo): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang thabs gcig go// de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos stond pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi nang du 'di lta bu'i chos kyi
41a4(mdo): gtamasrid yod bde dang sdug bsngal te// zad na rten yod ma yin no// de ltas bde sdug spangs pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bde// zhes stond par mdzad do// 'di ltar smras pa ci'i phyir
41a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs brjod par bya ste/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom par grags pa
41a6(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang / 'khor po'i gtso bo dang ldan pa/ 'khor rtag tu myi byed pa rmang du byung ba'i chos dang / cho 'phrul mang po mnga' ba'o zhes sgra grags/ gal te de
41a7(mdo): ltar ra ji 'khor lnga brgyar zad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bye ba can du 'gyur ro// yang 'dir smras pa gdul ba thams cad la mnga' sbyar ba'i stobs mnga' bas/ mnyan yod na de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong/
41a8(mdo): lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// zhes tshig tu gsungs pa/ ci dper nams bu zhur du thogs te rang gi yul nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba na/ rang gi bu spob sring ba'i phyir/ bu grong 'di nya'o zhes de lta phru
41a9(mdo): tshig smra ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba rjes su srung ba rnams dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs gcig go zhes bya ba yin nam zhe na/ de dag la smras pa/ dge slong dag chos kyi gtam
41b1(mdo): 'di ni lan gsum du bzlas pa yin te/ de bas na dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ba de dag ni skyes bu'i gtso bo rnams yin par rig par bya ste don gzhan ni ma yin no// dper ma khyu mchog re re la yang la lang gi tshogs
41b2(mdo): yod pa bzhin du skyes bu'i gtso bo la yang slob ma lnga brgya yod do// re re yang slob ma lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de lta bas mnyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ste/ 'di lta ste 'od srung chen po dang / de bzhin du
41b3(mdo): kun dka' bo las batshogs pa nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ dbang du gyur da pa/ glang po chen po/ cang shes pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba
41b4(mdo): shes rab shin tu rnam par grol/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa bya sa pa/ phur bor ba// rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid pa kra/ ma tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i zhes pas sems
41b5(mdo): shinang tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi / ma pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rjes su thob pa/ myi slob pa rnam/ sa dang slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
41b6(mdo): phyir sti 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa las batshogs pa/ da ga tu myed pa rnams dang / zag pa'i chos can gyi dge slong gi chos du ma dag dang / yon tan brgya stong dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
41b7(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed cing dpag tu myed pa phyogs bcu nas sbags pa gang yin pa de dag gi tshad kyang 'jam dpal ma gtogs pa/ sa mkhan nam bachis mazhan gyi slob mas kyang bgrang bar myi
41b8(mdo): nus shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang kyi nus pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
41b9(mdo): dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa las stsogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs tshad myed cing grangs myed pa/ dper na shing chen po snad pa'i shing shun
42a1(mdo): rnams 'byung ba de bzhin du/ sa chen po 'di kun pa bzhin du rdul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed cing / grangs myed pa gang yin pa de dag gi tshad kyang chis mkhan dam
42a2(mdo): cis mkhan gyi sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod pa myi nus pa lhag pa rnams dang / sring mo'i tshogs dge slong ma des ma las satshogs pa dang / ri dgas 'dzind kyi ma sa ga dang / btsun mo 'phreng
42a3(mdo): ldan ma las matsogs te/ dge bsnyen ma du ma dang / khyim bdag bzang sbyin las batshogs pa dge bsnyen ma du ma dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyi gu pa la bzhugs
42a4(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgo stond to// de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi mal nas langs te/ bsams pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas
42a5(mdo): de nas de rang gi mal nas yangs pa dang / rgyal po gshegs/ so zhes rnga bo che chen po dag ni rdung / dung dag ni 'bud/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba dag ni nam ma
42a6(mdo): la nyi mo'i 'od bzhin du kun tu snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyend bzhin du rmed pasten pas de nas de na/ bcom ldan 'ad so kyis kun dga' bo la bka' sacald pa/ kun dka' bo rnga bo che
42a7(mdo): chen po dag gi sgra dang / dung dag gi sgra grag pa 'di ci zhig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa skyong ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dam pa 'dir mchis te/ de'i rnga bo che dag brdungs pa'i sgra chen po 'byind
42a8(mdo): pa lags so// bka' yaN+Dald pa/ kun dga' bo tsa'i phyir rnga bo che'i sgra 'byind// gsol da pa/ rgyal po shaka kya'i mgon po lta zhing / mchi ba des rang gi dpung la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ded gyis/
42a9(mdo): chos shig ces go bar bgyis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs la/ chos kyi dung bus shig dang / ngas de nas rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba chos
42b1(mdo): kyi mdo bshad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mabo che chen po zhes 'gyi ba'i mdo/ sngon dam yang ma thos lags na/ nga bo che chen po zhes bgyi ba'i chos demisags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal/
42b2(mdo): pa/ kun dka' bo ci khyod kyis shes par 'gyur snyam 'am/ re zhig phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di ltar rnga bo che chen po'i mdo'i yig 'bru bzhi tsam
42b3(mdo): yang myi shes na/ khyod kyis sta sngon ma thos pa ji ltar zhes// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di de ltar rnyed dka' ba ni ngo mtshar che lags so// de bzhin gshegs pas bkal saHla da pa/ kun dka' bo mdo 'di
42b4(mdo): ni shi nad tu rnyed par dka' ste/ kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po 'di ni 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jig rten na mye tog u dum par rnyed pa bzhin no// gsol dang/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ 'di sangs rgyas
42b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsad pa/ 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
42b6(mdo): kyi yang chos nyid yin no// gsoyang la/ g.yad te 'di sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid lags na/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi
42b7(mdo): zhing de dang / de dag tu ma bshad cing rab tu ma bstan la/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi mchog 'di dag 'dir mchis lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yaN+Dal da pa/ kun dka' bo dper
42b8(mdo): na 'di ni/ dge slong dkon pa pa 'aka' zhig ri bo 'am/ 'ba' chu'i 'gram 'am/ phug ni ga na 'dug 'dug pa las nas rangs nus/ grong ngam grong khyer zhig tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba ra/ des sbrul lam
42b9(mdo): khyi 'am/ myi zhi ba'i ro 'am/ shi ba'i ro gang rung ba mthong ngo // des de mthong nas e ma ho kya hud e ma'o kyi hud bdag kyang yun ring por 'khor bar 'khor ba na/ 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs dag nyams su myong bar gyur/
43a1(mdo): pas/ da srid pa ni tha chad yin no zhes yid byung bar gyur to// de nas de dus gzhan zhig na snying dga' bar gyur da pa'i chos 'ga' zhig gis yid bde ba dang / de nas yang myi sems pa las yang des
43a2(mdo): ro mthong ste de mthong ba na/ de yid byung bar 'gyur nas/ de'i phyir zhing grong khyer ram/ ri 'am/ lung pa'i mdar rgyu zhing de de ltar rgyu ba na shi nas zhag gcig lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa 'am zhes bya ba
