84b2(mdo): tu phan pa stond pa'i dge ba'i myig nyam chung bar 'gyur ro// de rnams dus bdun gyi bar du gyur nas/ bar skabs der byang chub sems dpa' dam pa de dag ma gtogs par skyes pa 'am/ bud myed kyang rung sems can phas
84b3(mdo): pa 'ga' yang myed do// de nas 'khor de thams cad kyis 'grin gcig tu yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma 'jig rten kun mthong dka'// brtan po dge slong gzugs gyur da nas// ring zhing bstan
84b4(mdo): pa 'byin byed cing // chos kyi rnga chen rdung bar 'gyur// de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas// de 'og 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur// chos spa de nidas gyur da na// de 'dra gzhan ni 'ga' myi 'byung // de 'dra dge
84b5(mdo): slong rnyed dka' ste// rim gyis snang ba nyams par gyur da// 'di// ltar de ni lho phyogs su// 'byung ba'i tha ma gcig yin no// dam/ pa'i chos de nub dus su// chos smra ba de 'byung bar 'gyur//
84b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHla nas/ 'od srung da da kun dga' bo dang / bzang skyobasas gsogs pa 'khor mang po de ga thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus
84b7(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yi rangs te/ de dag byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa nyid kyi chos 'dod par gyur da to// 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rnga bo che chen po zhes bya
84b8(mdo): ba'i le'u/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya krA na b+hu ha na ma ma ha ya ma suSh+Ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags
84b9(mdo): pa rgyan stug po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po'o// / 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnga'
85a1(mdo): sbyar ba/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na/ stobs rnams dang / mnga' rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
85a2(mdo): gyi rkang pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing rjes su pyod pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor de dam pa'i rnal 'byor de can 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed pa
85a3(mdo): thams cad kyi gzhung rnam par 'jom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji
85a4(mdo): lta ba bzhin tu stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po s+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpalas mas dpa' chen po mthu chen po brnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dang
85a5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa/ dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang /
85a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin dad pa/ de dag las batshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shind tu
85a7(mdo): phra ba bye ma snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa'i yul las 'das pa/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi'i spyod yul las yongs su 'das pa/
85a8(mdo): shes dang yid kyi gnas gyur da pa/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / chos kyi srin gyi sa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum pa
85a9(mdo): yul las shi nad tu 'das pa'i gzhal myed khang gi pad mo chen po la 'khod pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de na mur 'dug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ba myed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
85b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i chos la bde bar spyad pa/ bdag gi so so rang gyi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyend pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 'byin pa sna tshogs
85b2(mdo): kyi gzugs du ma stond pa'i ting nge 'dzind las bzhengs so// bzhengs nas kyang sgo brang 'ja' dang / klog gi 'od can rgyad dang / lhab lbub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung ste/ zla ba dri ma myed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
85b3(mdo): khang stengs su gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ris kyi rkyen seng ge'i gdan dam pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhi
85b4(mdo): gzigs te/ gtsug gi rin cen 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po 'od gzer stong phrag brgya'i 'khor can sbyin mtshams das byung ste/ 'od zer gyi tshogs de byung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
85b5(mdo): rgyan thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gcig dang 'dra bar yongs/ su snang bar gyur da to// mchog tu phra ba'i rdul kyi phra ba nyid du sa / ngas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin phra ba nyid kyang yongs su
85b6(mdo): sdang po// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi rang bzhin rdul gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gan sa so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang / gza'
85b7(mdo): dang / zla ba spangs pa ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du myi sdang kye gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nam mkha' dang ma brtags par 'gog pa lta bur
85b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na pyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
85b9(mdo): gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rgyad dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthu phyung ba de dag gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'argyan gyis phyogs bcur byang
86a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du ston pa la bka' saHla pa/ rnam
86a2(mdo): par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du stond pa stug po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can du gtogs pa'i gzugs sred pa dang / ma
86a3(mdo): rig pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi mes rnam par bsregs te gnas gyurd pa'i phyir ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / yid bzhin gyi lus stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang kyis
86a4(mdo): brgyan pa/ gseb myed pa/ ring du gnas pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / nor bu dang / klog dang / 'ja' dang / byi ru dang / ba p+la dang / sdong ros dang / mtshal dang / mgo nag gi 'bru dang / kyi shu ka dang / oMne tra go ba dang / gser/
86a5(mdo): dang / tsam pa ka dang / pad mo dang / dung dang / ma bya'i mgul dang / mdongs bu me long gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i thob na sa sa dang / sar zag pa myed pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la
86a6(mdo): dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyind pa bcu'i sngo bas yu/ sa thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'ong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas
86a7(mdo): kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du stond pa stan las langs te/ bla kos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lpangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
86a8(mdo): de logs su thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig/
86a9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstand pa'i slad du/ skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saNayad pa/ rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston
86b1(mdo): pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shing dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dris pa dris pa lung bstand pas sems mgu bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa/
86b2(mdo): de ltar smros shig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba bzhin stond pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di
86b3(mdo): skad ces gsoya to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ba' shig/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
86b4(mdo): gzhan dag kyang de bzhin nam ci lags/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas
86b5(mdo): pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yod do// gas kyi bu 'di nas pha rol da shi na tu yang pha rol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi dbye ba stong phrag brgya 'das pa'i stod kyi phyogs can tshangs pa'i phya
86b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dang / skor ma'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
86b7(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shi nad tu yang pha rol tu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong
86b8(mdo): phrag brgya mang po byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ shAnd tu yangs shing rgya che ba dag yod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dam
86b9(mdo): chen po rnams la bdag gi so sor rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dang / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang / rnam par rtog pa'i khyod yul dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i de bzhin
87a1(mdo): nyid dang yang dag pa'i mapa la dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gdugs pa stond te/ de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa/ ji lta ba bzhin po nad te/ de ni ga rnam par dgod pas pa
87a2(mdo): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du stond pa khyod kyis 'di'i pha rol na 'jig rten gzhan dang / sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa de'i lan dungs 'di smras so// rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dang pa khyod 'bal nin
87a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dri bar sems par ma zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhugs 'dzin da 'di yang sangs rgyas
87a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i d+yad+yangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gyi gtsug tshad myed pa la ltad mo blta bar dod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyar song nas
87a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ka'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul ki mchog kyis gyen du song yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhugs/ 'dzind 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tsam gyi sangs rgyas kyi
87a6(mdo): zhing kyi rgyan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ra ma/ spyi gtsug tshad myed pa yang ma mthong ste/ des ma mthong ba dang ngom tshar du gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung kyi dbyangs kyi dkyis 'khor
87a7(mdo): dang / spyi gtsug bltar tshad myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa yang dag par rjes su dran zhing myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du phyi nad pas/ mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ nyes pa la
87a8(mdo): nyes par bshags nas/ sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes ste/ mngon par bstod nas bdag gis so sor rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
87a9(mdo): stug po nyid du song ste gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po sa dang / sa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa phra ba dang / dmyigs su bye bas pa dang / rnam par gdon myi za ba'i gtam
87b1(mdo): zlos pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka na ba der thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
87b2(mdo): to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu la zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na
87b3(mdo): bdag gis zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mchal da pa/ rdo rje'i snying po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang mi 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba drim
87b4(mdo): pa lung bstand pas sems mgu bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar 'gro dA pa de ltar spros shika/ de skad ces bka' saH lad pa dang / bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po/ bcom
87b5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas te/ sa bgyi ba dang / 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i don ci lags/
87b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das don dam pa 'phags pa'i yul chos nyid kyis ngas rgyas kyi rigs stond pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa'i sa la pyod pa dang / gzugs dang mtshan
87b7(mdo): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i bsdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams dang / mur 'dug gzhan gyis smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang / rdul dang ces pa dang / dbang po dang / phyogs dang / dus dang
87b8(mdo): nam mkha' dang / bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang / don nye bar 'du ba'i lci bar ltung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par zlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol du/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan tu gsol// ma rig pa dang
87b9(mdo): sred pa dang / las dang / myig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / de las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa dang / gsum 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i zhes pa can dang / rgyu dang / de ma zag pa dang / dbang dang / dmyigs
88a1(mdo): pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa dang / yod pa dang myed par smra ba'i rtog pa can dang / chos 'di pa'i phung po dang / gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi yang blo rnam
88a2(mdo): bzlog pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bstan tu gsol// chos kyi dbang po thob par 'gyur gyis/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan tu gsol// rnam shes lnga'i rgyu las mtshogs// mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par//
88a3(mdo): sangs rgyas blo dang zhes bya dang // ji ltar gang gis 'tshang rgya zhing // shes bya rnam pa lnga po rnams// thugs su chud pa sangs rgyas te// chos rnams thams cad mkhyend pas na// mya ngan 'das dang mnyam gshegs pa
88a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ dge'o dga'o// rdo rje'i snying po sa bcu la dbang sgyur ba rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ mkhas pa chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed
88a5(mdo): pa dge'o// rnal 'byor de dam pa la dbang ba sangs rgyas dang / 'tshang rgya bar yongs su dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'ba' shig ltad mo byung ba/ ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma byed pa bzang po dang / rgyal bu'i bu gzhan dag
88a6(mdo): kyang don 'di lta ltad mo byung zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci zhig/ ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ 'on te gzugs las gzha
88a7(mdo): zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/ nang dang phyi ma'i mnyam pa nyid kyang myi mthong zhing byas pa'i rgyu dang / 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir phung po
88a8(mdo): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa myed de/ rdul phra mo myed pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ shes rab dang ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi spyod yul te/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par rjes su ma gzugs
88a9(mdo): shig/ phung po rnams skyes pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku bas na rtag pa nyid do// snyam mo// kye rgyal ba'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa de dge'o// kye rgyal ba'i bu de bas na
88b1(mdo): dge bar ni rab tu nyan te yid la gyis shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das dge'o zhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po/ bcom ldan 'das las phyir nyan to// bcom
88b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis de la bka' maHsad pa/ rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying po ting nge 'dzind la dbang ba/ rdo rje snying po phung po rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma ya ni/ phung po las gzhan yang myed de/ phung po la gan
88b3(mdo): pa yang ma yin/ phung po yang gnas ma yin/ skye ba dang 'jig pa yang gnas ma yin/ shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ shes pa yang ma yin/ don kyang ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
88b4(mdo): zhe na/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / yul rnams ni mno bsam myed pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di rnams las nangangam phyir yang myi blta'o// gzugs ni spyod lar
88b5(mdo): skyed cing sems myed pa ste/ 'byung ba skyed pa'i chos rnamasamathar 'jig pa/ sa dang shib dang / bong rdo dang 'du bzhin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs dbu pa 'dra ba'o// tshor ba noganyis
88b6(mdo): tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra ba skye'o// 'du shes ni du ma pa dang / snam bu dang / cod pa las sotshogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de yang gnyis las skyes pa'i smyig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste
88b7(mdo): dper dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bab pa gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i rlabs lta bur rlab cing / ri dgas dang bya skom gyis nyen cing chu tshol ba rnams la chur rmongs par bya bar bya bas
88b8(mdo): rmongs par byed do// de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa/ de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las skyes pa/ dpyod pa rnams
88b9(mdo): kyis brjod pa las log pa shig tu myi dmyigs pa bong bu'i ma dang / mo shas kyi bu brjod pa ltar mying tsam du zad pa ste/ rmyi lam gyi gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o// dper rmyil ma na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthu
89a1(mdo): gsang pa'i tshe/ gzugs las mtshogs pa dang / bud myed bzang mo yang dmyigs su myed do// de bzhin du myi shes pas log pa na/ bud byed dang skyes pa las batshogs pa mthong ba yang mngon par sangs
89a2(mdo): rgyas na myi dmyigs so// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing gi snying po lta bu ste/ bsal na lus dang ngag dang yid las byung ba/ gzugs myed pa rnams rdul 'byor da can gyi dpyod pa pa rnams kyis myi rnyed do// rnam par shes pa ni
89a3(mdo): sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid myed pa ste/ sgyu ma byed pa'am/ de'i slob mas nan tan tu A dang / shing dang bong rdo tsam la brten te/ gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po che dang
89a4(mdo): rta dang shing rta dang myi dang / rgyan ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs pa/ cig tu ngo mtshar du bstand pa lta bu dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams la ma yin gyi/ bus pa'i 'gro ba rnams la drid pa de bzhin du/ rnam
89a5(mdo): par shes pa gzhan du 'dug la/ rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags// shing shind tu rtog ste/ de yang bdag nyid kyis bdag la 'dzind pa/ gnyis su shes nas/ sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig
89a6(mdo): po'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra bar phyir ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa brtan pa zer zug myi 'jig pa ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor da can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin
89a7(mdo): gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang rnam ma' las bur gyi 'jig pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gis 'das pa dang / byung ba dang / 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas
89a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bskrad te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / sa byung yang rudu/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chas spyon myed pa nyid mo 'don nan
89a9(mdo): gnas pamo// rdo rje snying po spyon byed pa zhes bya ba nis pa 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// rdo rje snying po skyon myed pa ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral bams zad kyi ting nge 'dzin pa yang 'jug go// da
89b1(mdo): myed par 'da' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'as spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo de nyid du mos te sems can la lta ba myed par gyur da cing / yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu byas nas/ lcags/
89b2(mdo): bsregs pa'i mye dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ de sems can gyi dgos pa la brtson 'grus btang zhing snying rje chen po dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang bral bas/ sangs rgyas gdung rnam par chad par
89b3(mdo): byed cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mur 'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gro ste/ ting nge 'dzind kyi 'dam du glang po chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs te/ rnam par shes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
89b4(mdo): kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas myi gnas shing rdzogs par myi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon tu myi bya zhing ma reg pa dang / nye bar myi bsgrub par gnas par bya'o// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rjes
89b5(mdo): su zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi che ga nyid shes pas/ chos kyi'o// khor lo bskor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul/ la nye bar spyod pa/ srul pa'i yul can de bzhin gshegs pa
89b6(mdo): rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i sbyor bas brgyad pa la 'das pa/ chos kyi sprin gyis la shes par rab tu byas pa/ sa sa rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gos
89b7(mdo): so rang gA rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i pyod yul gyi sar zhugs te/ thams cad du 'gro ba ma g.yos pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpyod pa lhun gyis grub pa/ rtag pa ther thug pa/ brtan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
89b8(mdo): stug po na gnas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang po la dbang ba rnams la 'phrul pa'i 'jug pa stond par 'gyur te/ gnas myur da pa'i yid bzhin ge ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin can stobs dang mngon par zhes pa dang /
89b9(mdo): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang la yod pa/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu bo zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/ lta ba don yod pa myi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta
90a1(mdo): bur 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstand pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang / dbang sgyur ste
90a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'o nor bu rin po che'i snying po las bcogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te/ sa'i rim pa rnams stan nas zhing nas zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston de cing phyi
90a3(mdo): ma'i mthar thug par sku grub pa'i sngags 'chang ba ltar myi snang zhing / khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du myi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar de dag srul pa'i 'od zer dang / 'phrul bas srul pa la spyod cing
90a4(mdo): 'gro'o// song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i srul pa'i sku nub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par gyur da to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
90a5(mdo): so// dbang po phung po srul da yin te// sred dang ma rig las kyang yin// bag chags kyis bcings myi zad pa// yul dang da/ bang po'i rgyu las byung // rnam dpyod tshogs ni 'dod chags rngas
90a6(mdo): zhags pas sems spyod de yin no// khro ba mye lce mnyam pa ste// / zhe sdang dug ni dngos po yin// thub spyod rnam 'byor da bzang can kyis// 'di dag rtag tu rnam gzhigs te// phung po rnams
90a7(mdo): ni dor ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor da can gyis rnal 'byor da pyod// gzugs ni 'byung po tshogs yin te// phung po'i lhag ma gzugs myed pa// ji bzhin par snang mo dang // dri la sdong dum las btsogs myed// ma'
90a8(mdo): la rlung gzugs kyi sdang dang // bya'i rjes rnams ji bzhin ni// mkhas pas so/ so rang rig pa// yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'// tshig gi khyod yul 'das pa ni// sangs rgyas dngos po myi sdang ste/
90a9(mdo): sangs rgyas smras ni mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas te// rnam rtog rtog bral bas na// de ni bstan tu myi nus pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu myed pa ste/ yod dang myed kyis rnam par spangs// /
90b1(mdo): rdo ba phye mar btags pa la// gser ni yod par myi snang ste// sbyangs pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis// gser gyi snang bar 'gyur ba yin// gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs te// mkhas pas phung po lhag
90b2(mdo): ma dang // khams dang skye mched tshogs pa dang // rnam par shes dang dbang po dang // gcig dang tha dad dngos por yang // rdul phran rnam par rab sbyangs na// dngos por sangs rgyas yod pa myin// sangs rgyas myed pa
90b3(mdo): 'ang ma yin te// rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas mthong // mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis can// gapar sdug bsngal de na bde// de nyid la ni sdang ba yin// sangs rgyas myed ces myi bya ste// sangs rgyas
90b4(mdo): mnyam par gzhag pa yod// rgyu'i sangs rgyas dge ba can// ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste// 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang // yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // 'di dag sangs rgyas sngar gsungs so// sprus/
90b5(mdo): pa'i rgyal ba lhag ma rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yo// da// mtshan rab sum bcu gnyis can// de bas sangs rgyasayod pa ste// rnal 'byor dade can gyis thub pa mthong // khams
90b6(mdo): rnams gsum po 'das pa dag/ rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas zhi pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi sangs rgyas zhing // rgyal sras bcwa dpos kun tu gang // de na thub chen sangs rgyas bzhugs/
90b7(mdo): mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas// rnal 'byor da brnal la mnyam par gzhag/ chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes// de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad// shes rab ma shes shes byed la// stug po
90b8(mdo): de na rnam par spyod// stug po de'i sems can su// sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag kun// skad cig 'jig pa shin tu 'das// ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mos// dka' ldan nas babs 'phrul pa gang //
90b9(mdo): rtog pa can rnams kun gyis mthong // stug po nags gshegs glang po ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni stug na bzhugs// sna tshogs rnam mang gzugs tshul te// sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa yis/
91a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam gzhag pa// chu'i zla ba bzhin du sdang // sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni// tshon gyi 'byor da las rnam par mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing ni// mnyam
91a2(mdo): bar gzhag pas rnam par mdzes// thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar// gcig dang tha dad spangs pa ste// dgos pa kun la 'jug pa ni// skyes bu dam pa thams cad mkhyend// rdul las ma yin dus
91a3(mdo): las myin// dbang po las myin gces las myin// rkyen kyis ma yin 'jig rten dang // sangs rgyas ldan par rnam mdzes pa// rgyu'i tshul du sangs rgyas ni// 'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes// 'jig
91a4(mdo): rten sku la 'khor bya ste// rgya mtsho re deng shing dag dang // de las 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas// mnyam par gzhag pas shi nad tu dgyes// bya ba thams cad phyi nang du// gza' zla las stsogs mdzes pa rnams//
91a5(mdo): phyir yang phyag gi mthil bkod de// yungs 'brur 'gro ba kun 'a/ dzud pa// sangs rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor da mnga'// thub chen/ thub pa'i dam pa po// 'jig rten rnams la byed pa myed//
91a6(mdo): sangs rgyas 'phrul gyi srul pa ste// 'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul// rab rib myi shes myong mdongs pa'i// rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin
91a7(mdo): bdag dang bdag myed lta ba rnams// yod dang myed pa'i skabs bcom// 'on tam thams cad 'jig pa dang // cung zad 'jigs pas smra ba rnams// 'di la myed dam cung zad dam// bdag dang bdag myed
91a8(mdo): ga la yod// sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'byung kun na// rnal 'byor da mkhan po rnam par mdzes// dri za'i krong la bya ba rnams// ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten na// rmyil ma rnam pa sna tshogs
91a9(mdo): gzugs// ri dgas rnams la smyig rgyu bzhin// de bzhin 'jig rten sna tshogs dag/ gdeg las 'tshogs pa'i las rnams kyang // rlung lnga pa sogs pa'i thag pa bzhin// sangs rgyas rnal
91b1(mdo): 'byor pa ma khyen kyi mchog/ gyis 'khrul 'khom sor bste// rgya mtsho'i rgya la 'dzim dpa 'dra// mug pa'i ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i len te/ dam
91b2(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzer nas/ pus mo ga
91b3(mdo): pa'i lha bas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gapan pa de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
91b4(mdo): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams myed pa lnga gyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / mnar myed pa la gzhol ba rnams dang / pa dang ma la snying ring ba rnams dang /
91b5(mdo): tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang / ba lang 'gum pa'i gums pa/ 'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur// ma ldan 'das sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji
91b6(mdo): ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams/ 'jo ra ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te/ de 'di
91b7(mdo): ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing kyi sbyin pa'o// chos kyi sbyin pas ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa
91b8(mdo): dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo // chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'gre yad to// 'ja
91b9(mdo): dpal sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na/ sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa dang / nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
92a1(mdo): gzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dang sbyin pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos sbyin pa dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis stug
92a2(mdo): bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal yang sems can la la mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa dag gam/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dka ga ma/ 'phags pa spong ba dag gam/ mnar myed pa la gzhol ba dag
92a3(mdo): gam/ bskal par gnas pa dag kam/ sems can gang la la dkon mchog gsum la snying ring ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa 'am/ tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/ chung ngu
92a4(mdo): du na lug gsod pa dag kyang phyag da pa yang rung / sme sha can yang ru nga ste/ 'jam dpal sus shinang tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin chen 'di thos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug
92a5(mdo): pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par stond pa dang / chung ngu na yi/ ge gcig kyang rung ste brjod pa dang / su yang chos de sba ba la mchod
92a6(mdo): cing rim gro byed pa dang / nang par langs nas ngo phrad par byed cing lta ba dang / sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang / lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba
92a7(mdo): dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sa'i phyogs kang na chos smra ba de 'dug gam/ de'i du ram/ ro 'am/ ro bas
92a8(mdo): ba zhig yod la/ ro'i ro mthong na yang mtshams byed pa'i las lnga nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal rgya mtsho chen po'i nang ra/ yi dgas lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de/ yi dgas de bdag gi las kyi sdug
92a9(mdo): bsngal myi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde sde po rA po ma 'do sngo ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal su yang mdo' sde 'di rim gror byas te/ mye tog dang
92b1(mdo): bdug spos dang / me mar dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de yang mchod par byas te/ ji ste chos sprul
92b2(mdo): de mtshams myed pa lnga byed na yang 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrug par myi bya'o// chung dun byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i mi dgas dang / bya gapa la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i robam 'dur khrod na 'dug pa'i ga zos kyang / de dag
92b3(mdo): thams cad phyir myi ldog ler 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te/ de la
92b4(mdo): nem nur dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis myi bya'o// sems cad gang la la sngon dge ba'i kha pa bskyed pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'as yongs su ka zung ba/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las ma nyams pa de
92b5(mdo): dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ mdo'i sde chen po rin po/ tshe 'di thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro// // mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i
92b6(mdo): rgyan stug po rin po che las/ sbyin pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // mtha' yas yul can shin tu phra// bsam gtan mkhyend pa skyes
92b7(mdo): shu'i mchog/ dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa / chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs// bsam gtan bsam pa bsam gtan pa'i// de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te// thub pa rnal 'byor da mkhas pa rnams// kun gyi
92b8(mdo): snying la gnas pa yin// yod dang myed kyi phyogs dang bras// sangs rgyas phyogs ni drim myed// blo dang zhes bya bral ba ste// tshad dang dbang po spangs pa yin// sems zhes rnams kyi yul ma yin// de ni 'gro
92b9(mdo): rnams kyi yul// mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste// de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan myed pa'ang // dregs can rnams kyi dregs myed mdzad// mnyam par gzhag cing gos pa myed// g.yo' ba ma yin g.yo'i myed
93a1(mdo): byin// chags pa myed lam la gnas pa ste// lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang // dI za lta byin myi 'am ci// thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis// bstod kyang rtag tu yod myi g.yol// de la ngo
93a2(mdo): mtshar sred pa myed// 'gro ba gang na yang g.yo ba myed// sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor dkyis// de na pha rol yin pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'phrul ba'i spyod pa yis// bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis// mthong yang de dang
93a3(mdo): 'di na myed// ji bzhin gnyis zla de dang 'dra// rnal 'byor da yul du gnas pa ni// dregs pa myed mdzad 'gro bas mthong // rnam par tha dad sur 'dug rnams// gang la keng gi dbang gyurd pa// de la de lta'i chos
93a4(mdo): stond te// rnal 'askyod pa'i 'od zer gyis// rnal 'byor da can chos rnams phye zhing // rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag// rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang // rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thub tshal
93a5(mdo): dang zhing rnams kyi// phun sum tshogs pa de las byung // lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang // rin chen kun 'byung rnam dag pa// lho'i// lha yi mthu yin na// phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin// 'byung
93a6(mdo): ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang // rnam pa sna tshogs khams rnams kyis// kang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag/ sangs rgyas snyun gyis grub 'bras bu// de ni mdor 'dzind 'gro ba yi// dag/
93a7(mdo): dang dka' thub can rig dang // gad mo che ba'i sbyor ba dang // gar mkhas rnams la rtag tu'o// dka' ldan gnas babs 'jig rten gyis// mthong na bud myed 'gro dang bcas// 'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel
93a8(mdo): pa dang // cod pan can dang la ka na gzhung// dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong // stug po nas ni de ma bral// yul 'di thub pa de yis te// thams cad na yang shin tu snang // rab rib cad kyi rab rig bzhi
93a9(mdo): ri dgas rnams kyi smyig rgyu 'dra// 'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la// ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang // rmyi lam na yang gzhan du ba'// rmyi lam bzhin du bus pas mthong // khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni//
93b1(mdo): rnal 'byor da can rnams log long bzhin// lha'i lha'i yul yin te// de yi sras kyi dus kun tu// myi sbyin gu lang tshangs pa dang // sa nan ta dang sa nan 'da'// sa nad gzho nu ser skye dang // ne tsol sogs
93b2(mdo): rnams bsams kyang // de'i yul la rnam par bslang// de dag rnal 'byor kyis myi mthong // thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang // byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa// de dag yul ni gang yang myin// lta ba'i bag
93b3(mdo): chags g.yogs pa'i phyir// sa dang sar ni rnam spyod pa'i// snying rje chen po de la bstand// lha'i lhas ni byas pa yi// stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis// 'di dag rdo rje snying po de// mnyam par gzhag la shin tu
93b4(mdo): bstand// rnal 'byor da can gyi rnal 'byor da yul// ji ltar ka/ ngagis 'byor da pa dag/ dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad par dag/ bzo' bor gyur da pas byas pa ni// gces pas rdul phran dag
93b5(mdo): gi ste// brtags pas dngos po yod pa myin// skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste// ldog par 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo// ku/ na tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi// yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags
93b6(mdo): mar mye bzhin du gsal byed pa// rgyu rnams dgos pa grub pa dag/ mtshan nyid snga nas myi rnyed de// 'jigs dang bral bas myi gnas pa'o// 'das pa 'das pa'i dngos por yang //
93b7(mdo): yod pa ma yin 'byung ba myed// rkyen du bya rnams myed pa yang // brtags pa'i dngos po gang yang myed// rkyen rnams tshogs te 'dus pa la// dngos po yod pa ma yin te// rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du gyur/
93b8(mdo): yod dang myed pa'i dngos myi sdeng // myed pa'i sdang ba yod ma yin// phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags// phung po tha mar ras las batshogs// ri dgas skom gdungs smyig rgyu bzhin// rmyi lam dri za 'dra
93b9(mdo): ba ste// gtsug lag nor pa dug dang bcas// rab tu phra ba sum brgya yis// 'jug pa dag dang phyir ldog dang // mya ngan 'da' la kang yang myed// de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dkod
94a1(mdo): pa yang bdag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ sa'i dbang po lag pa'i 'phreng 'a tshad myed pa/ lus dpe' byed pa/ dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gtsug lag gi rin po che dang / se mo dos shin tu chas pa
94a2(mdo): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ theg pa gsum dang / 'jig rten dang myi 'gal ba/ lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang gi/ 'phags pa'i
94a3(mdo): ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa rdo rje'i dbang po rnal 'byor dade chen po'i rnal 'byor de can/ rnal 'byor kyi mkhan po sa dang / sa'i mtshams thams cad myi 'gal bar stond pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
94a4(mdo): rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye bo thams cad dang / rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu cod pan cad dag la chos ston te/ de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod gsol ba gdab kyis/ bdag gi so so rang rang gi 'phags pa'i
94a5(mdo): ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring // myi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston da cig/ des bdag dang cod na
94a6(mdo): can 'di dag bdag la mngon sum du gyu rad pa'i pyod yul/ swa ngas rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob ste/ yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la dbang bsgyur zhing / stobs dang mngon
94a7(mdo): bar shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gi gzhal myed khang gis gnas gyur da te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa spangs te/ sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du
94a8(mdo): gyurd te/ rgyal po'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang / stug por stug po na pyod pa rnams la chos sna tshogs stond par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ rgyal po smos shig// dka' dge mo
94a9(mdo): cod pan can la khyad par du// chos la 'jug pa bdag myed pa// stug po'i rgyan ni rab stond pa// sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag/ rnam rtog spyod yul yin shes na// rnam rtog/ don las
94b1(mdo): phyir ldog pa// 'gro ba rtam rtog mthong nas ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstand kyis// rgyal po pal de nyon cig/
94b2(mdo): dpyid kyi smyig rgyu ji bzhin pa// de yi rnam par 'gro ba 'di// mtshan kazhi mtshan ma sgyu rnams las// rnam par rtog pa rnam myi rtog/ blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pa ste// rtogs bya de'i khyad gyu rad pa
94b3(mdo): gnyen por gyu rad pa gcig myed pa// nyi ma dang ni grib lhur gnas// sems myed tsam po 'ang yod pa myin// tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka myed// rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste// rnam par rtog pa na
94b4(mdo): myi rtog/ shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa// sems tsam de lta ra yin na ste// shes bya sems dang tsam pa ni// rtag tu tsam la shes yod myin// sems kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid// gang zag dag kyang gso
94b5(mdo): pa rnams// gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na// rtog da/ nga brtags pas spangs pa yin// brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur// dku la bsam gtan spyod yul te// bcu la sangs
94b6(mdo): rgyas sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang // myi zad chos kyi skur 'gyurar ro// nam mkha' zad dang 'dra ba ste// sems can rnam zhes
94b7(mdo): de bzhin te// myi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing / gartag cing zhi ba bde brtan pa// 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes te// stug po'i zhi na rnam par mdzes/ nam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste// sna tshogs
94b8(mdo): gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bas ma byed// sdug cing rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa// ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi chu// rdza ma chag pas bstand pa bzhin// gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste/
94b9(mdo): rdul kyang mchog phra'i de bzhin du// dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la// rgyu rnams ji ltar sdang ba bzhin// zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin zag banas pa'o// ji ltar shing las mye byung ba/
95a1(mdo): phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya// de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i mye// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya// gnas ki yul las 'phos gyurd cing // sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs pa// chags pa//
95a2(mdo): myed pa'i ye shes ro// stug po'i dbus na rnam par mdzes// bskyed myed rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// sa la gnas pa ma yin pa// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i// bdag myed nyid la skyabs su song // rgyud kyi
95a3(mdo): rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir// 'jig pa myed cing 'byung myed pas// lta ba thams cad zad byed pa// bdag byed nyid la skyabs su song // zhing myur da zhi ba zhir ma byas// zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du// lta ba thams cad
95a4(mdo): dag phyir// bdag myed nyid la skyabs su song // sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni// bdag po sa la bdag myed pas// myi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang // rnam par stond pa'i mdas kyang ste// bsreg pa tshig pa'i mya
95a5(mdo): bzhin du// bdag myed zhir gyur da de nyid du// de bzhin lta bas rna ma brtags te// bdag myed bsam gtan rab gnas pa// lta// ba'i chos la bde gnas kyi// so so rang rig spyod yul la/
95a6(mdo): thog ma myed nas nyes dri myed// 'phags pa rnams kyi sa la gan sa// 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te// 'jig rte na 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas// sems kyis las rab
95a7(mdo): gyu rad te// stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes// myi bdag myi bdag dbang po rnams// thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa// rdo rje'i snying po skyabs dang mgon// gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyid// sangs rgyas
95a8(mdo): yod myin myed pa myin// phung po'i skye shing rnams bsreg ste// dpung drang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas// stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas// shes bya dri myed zhi ba la// skyabs su song shig grogs po dag/ rtog
95a9(mdo): da las bral ba ste// klo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin// stug po'i dkyil zhugs rnal 'byor da can// de yang grogs po makon skyabs so// rnal 'byor da can rnams kun kyi zhing // zhing mchog bzang ba stug po'o//
95b1(mdo): rnal 'byor da 'byor da pa mang pos kang // stug po de la skyabs su song // spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// lta ba'i nges pa rnam par spangs// ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang // rmyi lam mo sham bu 'byung dang // rmyi lam/
95b2(mdo): bud myed bzang mo ltar// thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong // dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin// skra phung 'gal ba stor da pa ltar// smyig rgyu ri dkas sred mtshungs chu// yod dang myed pa rnam par spangs// sgyu ma'i
95b3(mdo): sus gzugs sna tshogs dang // 'phrul pa'i srul par de dag ni// 'jig rten myod che mthong ba ste// sa dang sa la thug pa rnams// bsngor myed du ma'i gzugs gyur da pa// sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar/
95b4(mdo): sprin dang du bklog ltar yang // thub pas rnal 'byor de rnam par mthong // rdza las sotshogs pa'i bzo' bzung ltar// 'gro ba bdag ki rnam rtog byung // yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang // chos ldi po la
95b5(mdo): nyid rnams dang // 'jug pa'i rnam shes yod pa ni// bdag myed// myi gnyis brgya nad pa ste// bag chags thog ma myed pa yi// sem sa kyi gnas ngan len byung yog// 'od pa'i dpa' rlabs 'dra bar
95b6(mdo): mi// kun gyi zhes la gnas pa yin// rlung gis ji ltar 'dod pa la// phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas na// dpa' rlabs rnams la 'jigs pa myed// 'od pa'ang myed par myi 'gyur te// snga myed
95b7(mdo): brag chags gnas can rnams// 'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag/ sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni// rnam par tha dad ma yin te// dus gcig tu yang de dag 'byung // bar bar du ni rims kyis so// thog ma
95b8(mdo): myed ses sems 'jug pa// skar ma gza'i dkyil 'khor dang // lo ma mye tog 'bras bu dang // ri dang sde dang tshal batshogs la// rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste// rims kyis kyang ni shes par byos/
95b9(mdo): yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul// ma la na gnas bzhin mthong ba yini// lus kyi 'jug par rims kyis kyang // srog la rten cing 'byung ba yin// rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnaMs la// tha dad rims kyis 'byung ba ste//
96a1(mdo): gyur zhing bca' da 'a'a' rnams la/ tha dad rims kyis 'ba' ba gyid// ro dang du'i rnam pa la// rims kyis pa dang 'byung ba yin// rims kyis 'dog khyad par gyi// gsogs sa 'dudupa sa //
96a2(mdo): thams na mas ts+tsha bzhin 'a na du// de bzhin gas pa ste/ rdo' rnams kyi sa/ yi ni can kyigagis sa nga// mi hrI pa zhe na
96a3(mdo): nas shes drug po rnam pa yang // sa'i 'ang par byed pa'o// bag chags sems dang ldan cig tu// sa 'on kun gyi kun gno ni// kun nas nyon mongs nas dag kyang // rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis// de de 'i di
96a4(mdo): gshegs kyi rigs// nges dang ma nges dge ba yin// rtug tu ga nas ltar 'byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs dag ji bzhin du// tha 'bring dang rab rnams su// de bzhin kun gnyis khyad par byed// @
96a5(mdo): dngas la rnam dag cing // gzhan du gyur da na rnam par mdzes/ yang dag ji bzhin don ston dal// rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa/ mthong zhing thos te shes pas na// sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis/
96a6(mdo): spobs pa can la bstand par gyis// khyad par du'o khyad par ba dag/ khams phran rnams kyi khams nang dang // sa la 'khor lo/ 'khor rnams dang // kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur da na// sa'i rgyas
96a7(mdo): por 'gyur ba yin// 'dzam bu'i glib pa dbang ba yin// 'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro// dka' ldan las batshogs gzhal du myed// mtshe ma rabs kyi dbang por 'gyur// dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te/
96a8(mdo): dbang bskur gnas su de bzhin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag/ gzugs khams bdag po 'ang de bzhin te// gzugs myed 'du shes myed sems can// bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur kyang //
96a9(mdo): yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas// yang dag mtha' la ma reg par// 'jigs myed seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan// bsam gtan dbang gis bde bas ngoms// de ni stug por smon/
96b1(mdo): ma yin// khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis// chags myed mnyam par gzhag pa ste// mthar da kyis stug por zhugs nas su// rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar// chos kyi dbang por bdag gyu rad te
96b2(mdo): rten las gzhan du gyur da cing bde// rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos// stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas// chos kyi dbang por rnam par mdzes// 'jigs pa myed pa'i myi'i mchog/ mya ngan 'das pa 'jig pa myen
96b3(mdo): mur 'dug rnams kyis cing 'arjod bzhin// mchog dang tha ya bar ma yi// rgyal po bcu po'i lus rnams kyis// theg pa gsum du gyur da pa ste/ stug po tshol ba'i khyad par yang // rgyal por yang dag skye ba 'phru
96b4(mdo): sa dang sa la gnas pas so// 'jig na 'dus byas nye bar 'gyur// 'chi ba rnams kyang de bzhin te// rgyal po 'jigs pa mthar ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku// sems can zad cing myed 'gyur ba// de
96b5(mdo): ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na// sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang // sems can 'byung ba myed par 'gyur// sems can mkhas rnam/ sa zad gyur da na// rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po myed// mya ngan 'da'
96b6(mdo): myed shes bya myed// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang myed/ mar bsregs pa'i dpal rnams dang // sa bon tshig pa'i dpe'ang ka gis// rtog can tha ra la mkhas pa rnams// lus can nas
96b7(mdo): la tha rad pa ston da// yod dang myed pa'i rnam thar kyis// zla rad pa'i bde las de dag ring // bsam gtan gnas pa thams cad de// lugs su 'jug dang bzlog pa dag/ gzugs myed 'du shes myed pa dang // mngon
96b8(mdo): shes dbang dang stobs rnams dang // ma nyams nyams pa myed pa'i// chos kyi mtshan la mkhas pa rnams// sa'i khams la mkhas pa dag/ myi'i dbang po stug por 'gro// yod dang phyed dang 'jig pas ni// de
96b9(mdo): dag 'khor las myi 'byung ste// 'phrad pa gsum po 'jig byed cing // rgyu dang dmyigs pa'i rkyen rnams dang // de ma thag dang dbang yang ste// sa rnams bdag myed pha rol de dag// myig dang gzugs dag rgyur byas te//
97a1(mdo): phrad pas gang dag 'jug gyur pa// gzugs rnams mngon byed ye shes dang // de dag thams cad zhig par 'gyur// phyi dang nang ki sa rnams ni// phan tshul stobs kyis byung ba ste// yod dang myed pa'i lta
97a2(mdo): ba las// de ste grol nas 'jig na ni// sems dang dmyigs las bral ba'i phyir// rnam par dmyigs pas myi gnas te// mdun tu rtog pa myed gyur da cing // de'i rang bzhin myi gnas la// gang tshe dmyigs pa spang ba la
97a3(mdo): rnam par rtog pa myi gnas shing // gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te// rtog myed rtog pa spangs pa na// de tshe sems ni mnyam par gzhag/ 'gro ba rnam rtog myed pa mthong // gzugs dang 'dzind pa myed pa ste//
97a4(mdo): bsam gyis myi khyab shes la gnas// rte nad pa las ni gyur da pa ste// ye shes gnas ngan le nad pa spangs// yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyan pa ste// sa gsum rgyal po rab
97a5(mdo): byed cing // stug po stug por rab tu 'gro// gzugs dang sems / dang sems las byung // myi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas// nang dang phyi// 'i sa rnams kyang // tha dad rnam par rab mthong zhing // so so rang
97a6(mdo): gi ye shes ma khas// lta ba'i chos la rnam par gnas// rgya la po stug por 'dong ba ni// ye shes mkhas pa rnam 'byor da can mtshan ma mying dang de bzhin nyid// rnam par rtog dang ye shes dang // /
97a7(mdo): yang dag mtha' la gnas pa yi// so so rang rig spyod yul du// rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu// rnal 'byor de sems dpa' rnal 'byor da can// rgyal po stug por 'dong ba ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa'i zhing du'o//
97a8(mdo): 'phrad pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te// bdag gi phyogs las 'phags kyur da na// phyogs las nyams par 'jig pa ni// rtog pa can dang mnyam par 'gro// ma grub pa dang yang dpe' ye// rgyal po 'gal byar
97a9(mdo): shi nad tu 'gyur// rnam pa rtog dang nyes pa'i mtshang// de dag rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro// 'phrad pa gsum po sun 'byin pa// chud zos bung ba ji bzhin du// de bzhin 'jig rten sun 'byin pa// yang dag ma yin rtog
97b1(mdo): pas smra// de la nyes pa rnam lnga ste// rtog las bslad pa'i dmyig can la// 'dra chos myi 'dra'i chos skyon can// nor dang bzlog pa myed pa dang // bdag gi phyogs las nyams pa'i blo// pha rol phyogs la brten pa
97b2(mdo): dang // lta ba de dag 'byung ba ni// thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig byed pa'o// sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'// rgyal po yod pa ma yin te// kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba dag/ 'byung ba dog par rgyug pa'o// de dang de'i
97b3(mdo): rgyud tu// thugs rje dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs// srul pa'i 'od zer lha rdzas kyis// zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khor// snga ma'i las dang tshul mthun par// pa skyabs chos rnams stond pa mdzad// rgyud dang rgyud
97b4(mdo): du bying rnams la// chos kyang bstan par myi 'gyur te// de ste mya ngan lada' 'jig na// rgyal bas yon tan ji zhig brnyes// dbang rgyur gsum po rnams dang yang // rnam par thard dang bden pa mthong //
97b5(mdo): rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po dang // dran pa nye bzhag stong pa nyid// tha dad yang dag shes bzhi dang // 'di la lung bstand pa rnams dang // dmyigs pa dang ni de ma thag/ rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te//
97b6(mdo): gzugs myed pa dang spyod pa dang // dbang po stobs rnams bcas pa yang // mngon par shes dang dad rnams dang // rnam par shes dang de rgyu dang // 'dus byas ma byas chos rnams dang // byang chub yan
97b7(mdo): lag gang zag dang // rnam par tha rad dang skyes bu brgyad// sa rnams dag dang mngon shes dang // zi yid kyis gnon pa'i 'du mched dang // ye shes mngon tu chud pa bcu// sdug bsngal chos nyid shes pa dang // sug
97b8(mdo): bsngal gyis su so sor rtog/ sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjes su shes// 'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang // 'dus pa la ni kun rtog dang // 'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dang // 'gog pa dag la chos shes dang // 'gog
97b9(mdo): pa dag la rtog pa dang // 'gog la rjes su 'gro shes dang // lam la chos kyi zhes pa dang // lam la so sor rtog pa dang // lam la rjes su 'gro ba shes// shes pa rnams dang slob pa bcu// brgyad pa mngan
98a1(mdo): lan bdun dang // rigs las rigs dang lan cig 'ong // bar chad gcig po gang zag dang // bar mar mya ngan 'da' ba dang // gzhan skyes mya ngan 'da' ba dang // mngon par 'du byed ma byas dang // steng mo'i//
98a2(mdo): rgyud kyang de bzhin te// rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang // ye shes spyod yul yin par gsungs// rnal 'byor da can yul sna tshogs te// tha ma mchog dang bar ma'o// byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du// mchog dang
98a3(mdo): bcas par de la bsgom// rang sangs rgyas ni dbu ma ste// nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o// bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa// lnga gsum bcu drug dag tu yang // sems kyi tshogs kyi 'gog pa ni// rnal 'byor da can rnams
98a4(mdo): shin tu byed// gang 'das de ni 'gags pa yin// sems ni nga bzhin 'od snang can// zag pa gang yin de sems myin// sem sa dang lhan cig gnas pa'ang myed// ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin te//
98a5(mdo): da ltar byung ba gnas pa myed// sems ni rkye nad dang myi ldan par// 'di dang gzhan du skye ba myed// bsam gtan bzhin sems myed// de// 'byung ba'i rgyu la gnod pa myed// 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam
98a6(mdo): shes te// yid dang rnam shes lnga po'o// rang gi rnam rtog myi shes pas// dpa' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin// rtag dang rtog pa sa rnam grol ba// thub pa kun kyi kun gzhi'o// yod dang myed
98a7(mdo): las lha rdzas su// gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing // stug po dang ni sdug dkyil tu// zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes// de ni myi 'jig bde bar gnas// stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas// tha dad ma yin
98a8(mdo): mtshan nyid mkhyend// ye shes ro gcig nyid du 'gyur// bsam yas rnal 'byor da yul can te// rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod// rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa 'di// rnal 'byor da khyer ba thub rnams kyi// rtag
98a9(mdo): par rgyal po de'i phyir// khyod kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor da shog/ 'dod rnams rnam pa drug po dang // tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang // gzugs mya dashes myed sems can du// rgyal por 'dod pa'ang thob par te/
98b1(mdo): bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir// rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams// bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur// chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang // pha rol sems dang kun rdzob dang // sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes bya
98b2(mdo): dang // 'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang // byang ba'i zhes dang myi skye dang // khong bzo bsgom pa de bzhin te// sha kun ta la rgyal rigs dang // ig shwa ku dang so ma'i rigs// yang dag don stong rgyal po'i mchog/
98b3(mdo): khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags// de yi rigs su khyod skyes shing // zhum pa myed par stug por song // lta ba'i chos la gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor da can gnas dri myed du// spyad pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing // 'gro
98b4(mdo): rgyu yug dang 'dra ba ste// rnga 'brug bzhin du lus phyed kyis// 'gro zhing 'ong ba byed pa ni// thams cad lus la yid yin te// sbru ma 'i rigs dag bzhin du gnas// sgyu ma'i zhing ltar sha nid tu sdang //
98b5(mdo): chu'i nang gi skye bzhin du// lcig sa myig dang yan lag rnams// sgyur bas rgyal po bzhin du me// sems dpe sems las kyu'o// dang yid// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag/ chos rnams
98b6(mdo): 'di dag dngos po myed// sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste// kun \u0f7f/ zhe thams cad sa bon 'di// bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris// sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang // 'ja' dang
98b7(mdo): klog rnams ji bzhin du// lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yus// de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin// su ma'i pad ma lta bur dag/ dri myed dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gsal ba gdon gyi ma'i rigs// sangs
98b8(mdo): rgyam nas pa bzhin du gnas// mtshan ma'i mthu los mying bya / mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ba'i// mamanas mying dang 'bral ba ste// rkyed rnams kyis kyang rnam par gtags// mtshan ma tshul dang kyi
98b9(mdo): dag las// rnam par rtog pa gnas tu 'byung // rnam par sbed pa byed pa'i// sus rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi rom sa ca ma sems rnams dang // bag chags yod kyang de bzhin te// sems dang rgan
99a1(mdo): cig ldan pa ni// khang pa la ni gnas pa yin// yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni// rnam shes lnga'i rgyu yin te// rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis// 'jig rten rgyu la rnam par lta// de ltar byed dang
99a2(mdo): bya ba myed// de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan sbyin// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor da can rnams de ltar lta// de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong // rang bzhin yongs
99a3(mdo): su grub pa ni// chos rnams chos nyid de yin te// brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa// stong pa ngo bo nyid myed de// yod dang myed pa'i phyogs spangs pa// sgyu ma rmyi lam rnaMs
99a4(mdo): dpa'adra// dri zo'i grong khyer lta bu ste// sgra tshogs rnams dang smyig rgya bzhin// du ba sprin stug lta bu ni// mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis// ji ltar mying du 'jug pa yi// tshig dang yi ge mang po
99a5(mdo): dang // mying rnams mang po la yang ste// kun tu brtags pa'i// rang bzhin yin// gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan// yid don da / bang po 'dus pa las// sa bon kun can bag chags dang //
99a6(mdo): tha dad ma yin sems dang bcas// rnam par zhes pa kun tu 'byung // gzhan gyi dbang po rang bzhin yang // phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so// so so rang rig shin tu phra// mthong ba'i chos
99a7(mdo): la gnas pa ste// rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags pa'i rang bzhin thugs chud pas// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras// rang bzhin yongs su
99a8(mdo): rdzogs pa ni// yang dag mtha' ru gzegs pas na// skye ba zad ces rnam par gsung // tshangs pa'i lam yang non ces so// / byas kyis bzod yang bya ba myed// phyin chad 'byung ba myed do zhes// sdug bsngal
99a9(mdo): kun las rnam par grol// g.yo' ba thams cad shin tu byang // bag chags ma lus bsregs pas na// rnam par rtog pa myi 'byung zhing // bdag myed shi nad tu mthong ba ni// chos dang gang zag bsgrags
99b1(mdo): pa ste// sa bon rnams dang bral bas na// sems kyi tshogs rnams myi 'jug go// thog ma myed dus bstsags pa'i// yid kyi gnas ngan len rtog pa'i// spros pa thams cad mngon bsal bas// mya ngan
99b2(mdo): 'das pa lugs bsregs bzhin// ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags// bsil bar gyur kyang 'jigs pa myed// de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang // mye zad bzhin du bsil ba yin// zag pa myed pa'i chos
99b3(mdo): dbyings su// zhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyas sras bcas// ting nge 'dzi nad kyi zas gnas pa// mnyam par gzhag la mnyam bzhag cing // mthong ba'i chos la bde bar
99b4(mdo): gnas// rgyal po rnal 'byor de can gyi yul// rnal 'byor da'ade yin brtsam par gyis// de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas// stu ga por 'gro bar 'dod na ste// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs
99b5(mdo): pa'i gnas// zhing gi mchog ni stug po'o// de phyir rgyal po da// ge bar choms// rgyal po rnams la 'ang dge bar gyis// mying ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung // mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste/
99b6(mdo): mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung // grub pa rnams ni ma rtogs par// rdza las batshogs pa dbang po'i yul// phung po yon tan ldan pa rnams// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// skye ba
99b7(mdo): la ni rgyu yin no// khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste// gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed// 'gro dang myi 'gro 'gro ba'i// gti muka rnams kyang shin tu skye// ring po thung ngu kha dog dang // chub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i rnams
99b8(mdo): sgra dang dri las gatshogs pa'i yul// dngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul// ji snyed dge dang myi dge dang // 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas// mya ngan 'da' ba ye shes yul// skad cig skad
99b9(mdo): cig rab tu 'byung // byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste// de ni mgyogs par shin tu 'gro// rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung // yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel pas// khab long lta bur shin tu 'khor// kha gnyis sprul/
100a1(mdo): mi ji bzhin la// yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te// kun gzhi na pa zhes log par byed// gcig tu 'on kyang rag tu byung // yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas// rgyu'i dgos pa byas nas ldog// bdag tu
100a2(mdo): tu dgos pa yang sha ni tu myed// bdag gi bya ba 'ang 'phel bar byed// lus la drod kyang skye bar skye// sna tshogs rnam par rab tu myod// zas dang skom dang longs khyod dang // gos dang spos stsogs rnam pyod dang /
100a3(mdo): mchog pa dag dang rgyu bar yang // myi'i lus ni 'dzind pa yin// kar dang gad mo yid mo dang // yin kyang rtag tu byed pa ste// sgra tshogs mgal mye bskor ba dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmyi lam dang // smyig rgyu la yang de
100a4(mdo): bzhin du// rngam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug/ ba bab kun tu 'khor ba'i sems// bdag sems khong du myi chud pas// lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang // phyag ma nyul ltar gnas pa'o// nyam chung snying po myed
100a5(mdo): pa ste// rnam par rtog pa rgyu myed pa// bdag gis rtogs pa/ 'i don la spyod// mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin rgyal po rnam shes sa bon no// lta ba'i yul du g.yol ba
100a6(mdo): ste// bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed// 'phag/ sa pa lam yin sa'i bdag/ rgyal po rnam shes gsum po 'i// 'jug pa rab tu bstan ste// 'di rnams dang bral grub
100a7(mdo): grub pa'i// rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no// bye ba phrag zhing ji snyed rnams// shugs 'dzind kyis ni mthong ba dang / 'phags pa me'u dgal bu yis kyang // lus dang lus ce'i mdzes pa rnams
100a8(mdo): de dag las ni 'di dag 'phags// stug po'i zhing na lo sa'i bdag/ thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa// de dag dpel 'am char gyi rung // bde ba yod dang mngon dka' dang // 'og gi zhing rnams bye ba dag
100a9(mdo): de dag de na gang bzhugs pa'i // sangs rgyas de dag stu ga la stod// stug ces bya yod sngon mtha' myed// rab byung 'phrul pa de yin te// zag pa myed pa'i sangs rgyas sa// 'byung ba gsum las 'das te
100b1(mdo): gnas// de ni bde ba nyer len myed// khyod dang nga'i khyod dang bral// ther zug mchog tu rtag pa ste// bstand pa stug po 'dus ma byas// yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu// 'tshang rgya 'og myin
100b2(mdo): nags mchog tu// sangs rgyas ma gyur da 'dod khams su// sangs rgyas mdzad pa myi mdzad de// de dag stug po'i zhing gshegs nas// sangs rgyas srul pa bye bayas// rtag tu rnal 'byor da mnyam
100b3(mdo): bar gzhag/ srul pa dag dang thams gcig rol// thams cad zhing du zla ba ltar// gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur ba// de la de ltar 'byung ba ste// 'phrul pa'i phrul dpa gang gis kyang // sa bcu
100b4(mdo): pa'i mdo'o mchog dang / sdong pos brgyan dang du ma'i/ gang yang rnam par yulang pa'i mdo// dpal gyi 'phreng ba la bshad dang // sgyu ma dpal las 'gro ba stsogs// mdo sde rnam
100b5(mdo): pa sna tshogs dag/ stug po'i rgyan nas rnam par byung // stug po'i rgyan gyis mdo sde 'di// mdo' sde kun las 'pha/ gas pa yin// rgyal po 'di la rim gror yang // rgyal
100b6(mdo): po rnams dang bcas par gyis// gzugs myed 'dod dang ga zugs rnams dang // 'du shes myed pa de bzhin te// gan sa las 'das te sangs rgyas dbang // bzhugs so stug
100b7(mdo): po'i dkyil 'khor na// pad mo 'dra ba'i gzhal myed khang // gzugs mang rnam pa snga tshogs na// lha rdzas rmad kyi ye shes te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis// rnam grol rnal 'byor da can
100b8(mdo): rnams dang // de na bcom ldan thabs gcig bzhugs// stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan bzhugs// sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi sa// de na bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzind pa// nal
100b9(mdo): 'byor da mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis// de'i mtha' myi myi gzigs pa// gzugs rnams dang ni yul rnams kyis// thub pa rnal 'byor da mkhas pa'i rnams// gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // stug/
101a1(mdo): po'i dkyis na nas 'azhugs shing // thams cad rnal 'byor da can gyis bstan// ba pra ga ser dang zla 'od can dang tsam pa dang ma bya'i 'grin pa pad mo 'dra// de'i ma la bzhugs pa lha yang wA'i
101a2(mdo): gzugs ni rnam par mdzes pa ste// de gzugs lha rgyal ko pa ka dag klog dang 'ol ma byi du bya 'od bzhin du// la las bal chung sku dbang bza' lo ma rtsa las matogs pa'i mal bzhugs par// mthong ngo nyam
101a3(mdo): stong ltar shind tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la// thub can la las rnal 'byor de dbang la stug dbus chu skyes re re bzhugs par mthong // thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs na lag gis 'gro'i mgo bo klod
101a4(mdo): pa bzhin du ste/ la lar gzugs ni rdo rje ma 'da' snyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro// la las la lar thub pa de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dang bcas par mthong // la las ji ltar
101a5(mdo): nam mkha' rgyu ba'i lam la 'ja zug bzhin du thub pa mtho pa/ lha rdzas phyag sor can gyis sna tshogs yul can ri rab rab gzho/ gcing / khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de
101a6(mdo): bzhin pa lang rmig par shong bar mdzad// sbyin pa'i shugs kyi sa myi'i bdag po'i chug gi cod pan rnams kyis rab mchod cing / la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams la
101a7(mdo): mkhas gyurd cing // chad pas gcod pa snga stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni// thub pa rnal 'byor nga mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor da shi nad tu byed pa rnams la ste/ rang gi yul
101a8(mdo): rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor kyis stond cing // sa As gnas dang lta ba yi dang blo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur da pa dang // dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin
101a9(mdo): dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar// la lar yul la chags myed spyod yul rig pa'i blo'i bya ba gcod pa ste// 'di dang gzhan myed bsreg myed gyur pas tshig bya myed phyir mya ngan 'das pa'i ro// snum dang
101b1(mdo): 'od 'phro myed pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'drin myed bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das// la las pha rol du phyind pa'i mchod sprin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste// sbyin dang mchod thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul
101b2(mdo): bzhin mdzad par shind tu mthong // bde' ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog de na skyes bu yod pa de dag ni// mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag ste// lha rdzas gser ltar
101b3(mdo): 'bar ba zla ba lta bu'i lus 'chang rnal 'byor da can gyi bdag/ lha rdzas 'od bzang de dang gang yang myi rnang rnal 'byor da can gyi dbang po'i yul// lha rdzas 'ad bzang da dang gapa yangang // de dag brgya char myi phod rnal 'byor
101b4(mdo): can gyi dbang po dag gyi bde de la/ gzhan du bdag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs la spyod pa'i zhing gi myi de dag/ mtha' yas 'od kyi bde' ba can na rgyal ba'i sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can//
101b5(mdo): rnal 'byor de yang dag nyid mos thub dbang khyu mchog bsam gta na bdud rtsi myong byed dang // rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po ched/ ka yal ga sbyangs pa'i nags tshal shing // lha rdzas gser
101b6(mdo): phye'i zhams las bstsags pa'i zhing gi mchog de shin tu rnam pa ra mdzes// gser dang rin chen sna tshogs mye tog pad mos de ni mchog tu rab tu brgyan// 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter
101b7(mdo): yin dpe' myed de kun gyi yang pad mo skyes/ thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan mkha' la sangs rgyas sgyid la rab tu mos// bdag gi bstod pa la ni bdag bstan yid can pad mo dam pa dag las skyes pa ste// sangs
101b8(mdo): rgyas zhing gi mchog na gnas pa'i myi ni bzang po'i mtshan kyis kun nas brgyan// dpe' byad bzang po bcas pas rmang du 'bar ba'i lus can dpal bye'u dang bcas// yod dang myed pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa myed pas dri myed
101b9(mdo): rtsub pa myed dag go// de ltar 'di dag rnam par bstand nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bo tsam du gyur da// sro ma rdul phran shi nad tu phra ba'i sgra'i brgyad cha'i gzugs su 'ang de bzhin gyur da// la lar bde gshegs rang
102a1(mdo): rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // gang dang gang la sems kyi spyod pa ji bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag/ rnal 'byor da mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas
102a2(mdo): tshad myed gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs// de skad bshad nas yang smras pa// sna tshogs gzugs can rgyal ba'i sras// sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang // ma nyams mngon par shes pa dang /
102a3(mdo): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind dang // de ltar yid bzhin lus kyang ste// gzugs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang // rnam thar da tha dad yang dag rig/ stobs dang 'jigs pa myed pa dang // phung po thams
102a4(mdo): rnams zag myed pa// 'di dag gzhan du gyur da nas mthong // / rtag pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo // chos rnams lnga'i ra nga bzhin dang // rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams dang /
102a5(mdo): bdag myed gnyis po rab brtogs nas// gzhan du 'gyur ba// ra 'byung bar 'gyur// yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag/ sgyu ma dpa' bas 'gro bas bskor nga// myi zad smon lam
102a6(mdo): bcu po dang // lam gyi rnams kyis shind tu sru lAd/ rmyi lam me long gzugs brnyan nam// chu'i zla ba bzhin du mtho pa// rnal 'byor nga lam la thub pa rnams// sangs
102a7(mdo): rgyas sa la bzhugs pa dang rgyal po pad mo'i ba dan bzhugs pa rgyal ba'i sras kyi mdun du byas// yod dang myed pa'i phyogs bral ba// rdul phrad rnam par 'jig rnams kyis// dri za
102a8(mdo): grub pa'i rgyal po'i dang // lha'i gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs// ri rabs la 'dod rgyu zhing // nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'khod spyod kyang // ji ltar snang bar ma gyur da pa// de bzhin rgyal sras gces
102a9(mdo): pa' rnams// rnal 'byor da myed pas myi mthong ngo // rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan// sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na/ rgyal ba mchod la mngon par mos// smon lam dbang la gnas
102b1(mdo): pa'i rnams// pad mo'i zhang par rab tu skyes/ dbang dang bsam gtan sems dpa' dag/ zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'// ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ston pa// lhund kyis grub
102b2(mdo): par thams cad du// chur byung zla ba 'dra' ba ste// nyi ma lta bur khyad myed pa// snang ba sems can spyod yul du// yang dag mtha' la myi reg par// ting nge 'dzin las ragu ldog/
102b3(mdo): gru la gnas pa'i bud ba dag/ gang chen mtsho' la 'gro ba bzhin// kang tu gru 'gro der rgyug ste/ dpag tshad shind tu mang bar yang // thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' ba'i yul// sdug
102b4(mdo): bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du// de dag 'byung b.rarab tu ston // phyir ldog bdag myed pa yang ste/ 'dzi ka pa dag kyang rnam mkhyend nas// zad pa'i dus su skye
102b5(mdo): gnas pa// gzung dang 'dzind kyis 'phags pa'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzind la spyod pa'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzind kyis bskyed pas na// mtshan mo'i gzhi
102b6(mdo): myed mtshan nyid myed// 'khor ba'i rgyund kyis khyer ba rnams// yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin// gcags myed mtsho'i gter gyur da la// gcig la gcig 'ju'
102b7(mdo): spre'u ltar yang // byed pa gru la gnas kyis mthong // 'jug pa'i gnas dang rten myed par// de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams/ sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i// rnam rtog
102b8(mdo): sdug bsngal gnas pa rnams / sa'i gnas na nyon mongs phyir// rab tu 'byung dang phyir ldog dang // sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung // 'di 'dra rnal 'byor da can kyi mchog/ rnam
102b9(mdo): pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis// bam po /
103a1(mdo): bam po// // kun tu bzang po mya'i bdag/ gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs
103a2(mdo): gzugs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// rdo rje snying po la smras pa// 'thun pa dga' la dbang byed dang // lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang // rin chen khang pa sna tshogs na// gang yang stug po'i
103a3(mdo): dkyil 'khod pa'i rgyal sras rnal 'byor da ldan pa dag/ gang gis stug ces bya zos te// thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams// gzhan du 'gyur la gzhol ba dag/ gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul zos shing // ting 'dzin de'i tshul
103a4(mdo): song ba/ gsug por ring po mya thogs 'gro// sangs rgyas yang da ga 'gro la mos// 'gro ba 'dzin dang zhugs 'dzind dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang // mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang /
103a5(mdo): zla ba las spogs gzugs dbang rgyal// blo gros shin tu zhi ba dang lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor da rig/ du ma nam mkha'i bdag po dang // phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang // rnal 'byor da can dang rgyal sras rnams/
103a6(mdo): gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas// chos nyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams/ stug po'i rkyen la gzhol ba dag/ rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang / khong nas snying rje snying rtse ste// rnal 'byor da ldan can dbang po'i gtso/
103a7(mdo): sna tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras// rnal 'byor da can gyi gcol dris// 'jigs myed rdo rje snying po la// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // dbang sgyur khang pa bzang por yang // ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byas// sna
103a8(mdo): tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis spos// dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid// 'gro ba dag gi yang rab 'byung // rdzas las sogs pa'i dngos po dag/ ji ltar chu 'dzin thal shar las// las su bya ba thams cad bskyed// 'gro
103a9(mdo): ba 'di dag de bzhin byas// rnga dang pibang sgra las sogs// las su bskyod las dbyangs 'byin te// de bzhin 'jig rten 'di yang ni// bskyod pa'i las las kun 'byung ngam// rang bzhin gsum po ji bzhin du// dngos
103b1(mdo): po gcig la kun tu gnas// sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du// dngos dang dngos la rab tu gnas// de bzhin 'di dag kun kyang ni// dngos po gcig la rab gnas sam// gang phyir 'di ltar rgyan dag snang // khams
103b2(mdo): gsum gso dang myi g.yor bcas// dga' ldan 'tshem rab rnams dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyis byas sam ci// myi 'am ci dag du ma dang // gya nom snang bas byas sam ci// 'og myin thor tshugs can gyis sam// 'on tam gzugs
103b3(mdo): myed rnams kyis byas// lha rnams bdag po thams cad kyis// gcig tu 'dus te 'di byas sam// 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis sam// rgyal ba khyu mchog gis mdzad dam// 'on tam rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// zhing
103b4(mdo): gzhan rnam par gzhugs pas sam// rnal 'byor da la mkhas nal byor da can// sangs rgyas zhing du bzhugs rnams kyi// sa rnams thams cad byas sam ci// gang la nor ba rab tu gnas// gang 'di
103b5(mdo): nor ba snang ba dag/ spyig spu rnams la chu bzhin te// rdza ma'i phyog/ sa la yon tan bzhin// 'gro ba gang gi phyogs la gnas// yon tan myi 'bral yon tan can// yom tan myed dang yon tan gnas/
103b6(mdo): yin phan tshun 'brel bas na// yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas// nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du// gang la'ang de bzhin gnas yin nam// 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// sa rnams la ni gang snang ba// 'on tam tshangs
103b7(mdo): pas phyung ba 'am// 'gro ba mthu bo che yis sam// khyu mchog gis sam spun zas sam// ser skya yis sam rang gis sam// gces pa'i rkyen gyis byas sam pa// rang bzhin gis sam dbang pos sam// dus dang phyog
103b8(mdo): kyis bskyed pa'am// 'on tam ma rig sred pas sam// lha'i drang srong the tsom za// lha'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams// sa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dacaran// 'on tam 'di dag myig
103b9(mdo): 'phrul lam// 'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam// rmyi lam yin nam spyigs rgyu'am// sngon myed rnam par rtog yin nam// gzung dang 'dzind pa'i dngos por yang // kha gnyis sbrul bzhin gnas pa'am// 'on
104a1(mdo): tam rang bzhin 'di myed dam// 'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam// mgal pa skor pa 'dra ba 'am// 'on tam skra'i tshogs lta bu'am// byed dang las kyis ma byas shing // dbang po ku be ras ma byas// mtsho
104a2(mdo): sbyin sbyin sreg mchod 'bras sam// smang gi gzhung gyi lam gyis sam// rgyu rnams shin rdzu 'phel che bas// nan tan rtag pa ma yin te// 'gro ba 'dzin pa myed pa'ang myin// rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste// 'gro ba po
104a3(mdo): bo nyid kyis 'grub// las kyi bag chags rnams las byung // rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni// kun gzhi zhes kyang bya ba ste// des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun// rdza ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du skor// til 'bru
104a4(mdo): til mar ci bzhin du// lan tsa'i tsha bro ji blta bar// gzugs la myi rtag nyid ji bzhin// skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas// ji ltar gsu pa las stsogs la dri// yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan// gnyin
104a5(mdo): gnyis kyi 'od gzer bzhin// de ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin// dgos// dang byed pa myed pa ste// yod dang myed pa'i phyogs kyis spangs// gcig/ dang tha dad myed pa ste// mur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs// rjes
104a6(mdo): su 'gro ba'i shes pa myed// ni snga rnam par myi rtag ste// grol ba'i so so rang rig pa// sangs rgyas sar skyes grub can gyi// gzung dang 'dzin ba myed pa ste// snga myed sems dang sems byung gyis// rnam
104a7(mdo): shes brgyad dang bral ba ste// nam yang rnam par myi rtag pa'o// de la gnas pa mya rlabs bzhin// phan tshun mtshan nyid tha myi dad/ 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste// de'i ldan pa rig pa myin// ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor/
104a8(mdo): dang // rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin// mnyam par gzhag pas rab tu mthong // rnal 'byor da 'gro ba gzhan gis myin// de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams// de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gnas// rnal 'byor da can
104a9(mdo): kyis rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin// des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang // ji ltar ji ltar nor bu phug pa'i rnams// skud la rgyus dpa'akhor lo bzhin// las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa// ji skar
104b1(mdo): rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang // lag dang thal lngar bskor ba yis// kun tu bskor cing sdod byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs rnam par sngan// de bzhin nam shes brgyad kyi myi// khams kyi gzugs mnyam lhan cig tu// sa ni rnam par byed
104b2(mdo): pa ste// phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gang la 'jig rten 'di dag kun// nam mkha' skar tshogs ji bzhin du// gnas shing rnam pa snga tshogs rnams// rlung gi rta yis shin tu bskor// ji ltar mkha' la bya rnams kyi// rjes
104b3(mdo): ni snang ba ma yin te// bar sdang yod pa'ang ma yinana'ang// bya rnams rgyu ba'i byed pa myed// de bzhin rnam par shes pa'i myi// bdag yod ma yin gzhan myed myin// rnam dag par snang 'dra ba dang // dpa' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung /
104b4(mdo): bag chags rnam pa'i nyes pa yis// myi chags pad ma'i zla ba bzhin/ pad mo la ni tu myed byin// tshul zla gzugs myed pa yang // chu song // ba yod pa ste// pad ma'i 'dab la de bzhin chu// myi gang bud myed
104b5(mdo): gzhon nu dag/ myig gis mthong bar cir myi 'gyur// de bzhin kun// gzhi rnam par shes// las rnams gcig par byed pa ste// 'gro// ba dag gi lus la ni// khyab gnas sa bon kun can no// stug po'i/
104b6(mdo): sprin dang 'dra bar yang // sa rnams g.yo' bar shin tu gnas// tshe dang rnam shes kun nas yog/ drod kyang de bzhin stobs cen gyis// swA tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi// rnam pa sna tshogs gzug kyang brtson
104b7(mdo): rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la// pyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o// ba lang stsogs pa'i ru mthong zhing // bong bu'i rwa ni myed pa ste// ma mthong bar ni myed pa myed// ba lang rwa ni myed pa yang // phyin ci log tu dmyigs pas myed// phyin ci log/
104b8(mdo): gis mnar sems la// shin tu phra ba'i rdul bshig ma// yod pa de dag myed par 'gro// myed pa yod pa'i rgyu las ste// myed pa yod ces rtog pa ni// yod pa myed pa las bltas pa ste// phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu las so// blo
104b9(mdo): dang rtogs bya myed pa ste// khong du chud pa skye ba myed// mgal pa'i 'khor lo 'khor lo myi ni// ji ltar sgra tshogs mthong ba bzhin// dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dag/ ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba bzhin// blo'i 'byung ba rgyu myed par// yod
105a1(mdo): yod pa ma yin rnam rtog pa// rtog bya rnam par rtog pas skyed// lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te// mying dang 'du shes 'brel ba dang // rang bzhin gnyis kyi bag chags kyis// myi'i sems ni rab tu 'byung // grub pa'i don ni
105a2(mdo): gyi skye'o// gzog ma myed pa'i dus na bsags// gnas ngam len gyi yul las byung // rab tu spros pas bskos yid las// sems kyi tshogs ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gzung dang 'dzind pa'i dngos por yang // kun tu skye ba myi'i sems
105a3(mdo): rdza las stsogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs// snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te// 'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas// rtog bya'i dngos po yod pa myin// blo dang rtogs bya'i dngos por ni// bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste// byis
105a4(mdo): pa rnams kyi myi rig pa// bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams// rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang // dus gcig tu yang 'gyur bar 'gyur// sngon myed bag chags ldan pas na// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can//
105a5(mdo): rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du// rlung gi rkyen kyis bskyod pa ltar// gar byed cing ni rab tu 'byung // rnam par rgyun kyang myi 'chad do// blo'i'o// da pa de bzhin rtag/ yul dang reg pas skul ba'i phyir// sna tshogs
105a6(mdo): bdag rtog rnam shes kyis// bdag la bdag gis 'dzind par byed// rdzi ltar sa la rnam rtog myed// 'gyur myed rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// da gos pa'i rnam par gyur da pa ni// de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o//
105a7(mdo): ji ltar myi zhig lag pa yis// rang gi lus la mnyed pa dang // phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la// bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang // ji ltar shes can la la dag/ bdag gi lus la sos 'debs pa// de bzhin blo ni brtag don la/
105a8(mdo): don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o// blo'i yul du bya ba 'di// khams gsum rnam par khyab par gnas// phyi dang nang gi bya bar yang // rnal 'byor de mkhas pas mthong ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs// sa la ji snyed
105a9(mdo): sdang ba dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs// sa la rnam pa sna tshogs so// chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang // rdo rje snying po 'jigs myed pa// myi smra'i dngos la 'gal 'gyur te// bsam gyis myi khyab chos dbyings kyi
105b1(mdo): lnga'i bsam gtan myi g.yol ba// sangs rgyas pyod yul zhugs pa dang // stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i gzugs// mthong nas rnal 'byor da lam gnas pa// thub pa de'i lha rdzas lus// rnal 'byor da btang ste yang gnas so//
105b2(mdo): 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs myed dang // 'du shes myed pa'i gnas rnams kyi// mun pa'i tshogs nas phyir byung ste// stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog
