317b6(mdo): ji ltar lam bstand par bya zhe na/ sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems rab du dang ba nyid dang / yang dag par 'du shes pa dang / som nyi myed pas lam la lam nye bar bstand par bya'o// gal te/
317b7(mdo): the tsom myed par ma gyur dam/ des lam shes pa'i skyes bu dag las mnyan nas lam nye bar snyand par bya'o// chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal myu ra tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
317b8(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul bzhin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // tshul bzhin chos ni nyan byed cing // tshul bzhin shi nad tu don sems pa// chos rnaMs
317b9(mdo): kun gyi pha rol phyir// lus can rnams la phan don tu// chos de yongs su tshol ba na// mkhan po dag dang nye gnas ni// gus pa kun gyis bya ba yin// rtag tu byams pa la gnas nas// byas
318a1(mdo): pa gzo dang byas pa tshor// ngo tsha khrel yod phun sum tshogs// phra dog tshul 'chos rnam par spangs// nad pa rnams ni gso' byed pa// snyen dka' rin chen 'du shes kyis// de dag 'du shes nyer bzhag nas//
318a2(mdo): legs par bshad pa yongs su btsal// de dag thos pa bde 'gyur dang // shes rab rnon po yang skye 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag/ thams cad byams pas zhi bar 'gyur// dper na skyes bu zhus
318a3(mdo): byas la// 'ga' yis zeng ba byin pa na// lag pa gnyis kyis yongs blangs nas// spyi bo la ni 'jog pa ltar// de bzhin legs bshad thos nas kyang // dga' ba'i sems ni skye 'gyur ba// rgyal srid thob
318a4(mdo): pa 'am de lta bu ya~M// dga' ba rnyed pa ma yin no// rtag tu de dag chos smra la// mchog tu bla mar bya ba yin// chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas mtshan te// chos ni dgra bcom rgyal mtshan yin// sangs rgyas chos rnams thos nas
318a5(mdo): kyang // bsgrub pa dag la rab gnas shing // tshul khrims thos pas nges 'byung ste// dper na sar gyi ro'i zla ba bzhin// mi mo// ngas zhe sdang myed pa yis// lam mchog dag ni bsten pa dang //
318a6(mdo): byis pa gang la gus bcas pa yaM// lta ba'i gnas kyang rnam pa ra spangs// ser ges spangs pa'i wa bzhin du// zil kyis mnan pas chos rnams 'chad// rlung kas sprin gyi tshogs bzhi
318a7(mdo): mu stegs can gyis zil gyis mnan// sa la sprin gyi tshogs bzhin du// chos kyis yongs su tshim par byed// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngas ni// sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du sel ba// sems ni rtse gcig ya
318a8(mdo): bzhag pas// de dag rnam rtog spyod yul myin// de dag 'khro ba lhur myi lem// 'phyar ba la yang myi gnas so// dus dang dus myin rnams shes shing // don shes pa yis rnam par 'dren// rtag tu bzod stobs
318a9(mdo): la dga' rnams// shes pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur// mkhas dang mthu la brtan pa dang // chos shes pa la mkhas pa dang // dpa' zhing sems stobs che ba dang // rlung gis chad pa'i rdul bzhin du// sdig
318b1(mdo): can nams ni mis kyis gnod// phyogs rnams dag tugs la gnas pa// nyim 'bar ba ci bzhin du// mkhas pa de dag 'ang don sa// ched du smra ba brjod kyi byed// 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ bsas gtan
318b2(mdo): mngon shes dag la mkhas// de dag rnam pa 'di 'dra bas// bdud kyi steng na gnas pa yin// sems can rnams la rtse ba'i phyir// 'jig rten mar me byed cing skya// shAri'i bu gzhan ya bcos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang
318b3(mdo): chub sems dpal bzod pa bsrub pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gus pas tshul khrims srung zhing / so sor thar pa la khyad du myi gsod pa dang / gus pas byams pa sgom par byed cipa/ gnod sems la sbyor ba yang spong bar byed/
318b4(mdo): pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa la/ 'dun pa drag po bskyed par yang byed pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad la gces pa myi 'dor ba ste/ sha ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
318b5(mdo): bzod pa bsgrub pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkal satshal nas/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs/ nas/ stond pas gzhan ya pa'adi skad bka' saHla to//
318b6(mdo): de dag sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa 'i// tshul khrims ma nyams ma rol srung // tshul khrims phung po dag pa la// dka' ba nye bar skye bar 'gyur// chos rnams mang po tshol byed cing // thos pa mang ba la
318b7(mdo): legs gnas na/ gang gis the tsom gcod byed pa// res de'i shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// skye dang 'chi ba'i rgyun dag las// 'di dag ji ltar dgrol bya zhes// ltos myed phan pa'i sems dag gis// ram
318b8(mdo): pa'i chos kyang stond par byed// gnod sems don du myi gnyer bas// byams pa'i sems kyang sgom par byed// myi 'jigs pa dang phan pa'i sems// bdag dang sems can mnyam pa nyid// byang chub brten
318b9(mdo): ba'il gnod pa'o// brtson pa dag kyang legs par rtsom// gang dag byang chub la brten pa yi// dge ba'i chos rnams tshol ba dang // bsgom par bya ba sgom pa dang // spang bar bya ba 'ang rnam par spong // rdzi
319a1(mdo): ltar spang bya spangs pa yis// myu rang tu mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// dgond pa'i gnas la mngon phyogs shing // gnod pa dag la rgyab kyis phyogs// thos pa tshol ba brtson pa dag/ go 'phang mchog ni rtogs//
319a2(mdo): par 'gyur// dge slong dge slong ma rnams dang // dge bsnyen de bzhin dge bsnyen mal// thams cad dag ni de dag gis// 'dris pa rnam par spang bar bya// byis pa yi lam la brten pa yi// mongs pa kun kyang skyabs
319a3(mdo): myed de// gang gis chos la brten pa dang // de dag sangs rgyas mchog tu gzhol// myi gang sems can don dka' ba'i// sangs rgyas pa dang ma yin no// g.yo' myed chos la 'dod pa dag/ byang chub la ni rab tu dang // sangs
319a4(mdo): rgyas dag tu myi lta ba ya~M// myi rnams mtshan nyid gsum gsungs te// g.yo dang chos myin 'dod pa dang // snyoms las dag la rtag dga'o// 'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // de bzhin sdig pa rab spangs nas//
319a5(mdo): blo ldan brtson 'grus ldan gyur da pa// byang chub la ni rab kus 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha r-i'i bu dang / lha dang / mr-i dang / lha ma yin dang /
319a6(mdo): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// byang chub sems dpa' pos sor thar pa'i chos bzhi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
319a7(mdo): mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po tA pa ka ra shr-i gnya' na dang / lo tsa ba ban de shig kya blo gros kyis bsgyurd cing zhus//
319a8(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ga ya shir kha nA me ma hA ya nA su tra/ bod skad du// ka ya mgo'i ro zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub ses
319a9(mdo): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par/ bcom ldan 'das yig ya na/ ka ya mgol mchod rten na/ dge slong
319b1(mdo): stong du chang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang sngon ras pa can tu gyur da ba/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su 'thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su bad ba/ yang dag pa'i
319b2(mdo): shes pas sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu so nad pa/ dgra bcom pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/
319b3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das gcig pu dben par gshegs te/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la brtags te/ bdag gis byang chub ni thob/ bdag gis ye shes mi 'ong du chud/ bya ba ni byas/ bdagan 'ad gnam
319b4(mdo): ba'i 'brog dgon pa las ni rka la/ bdag gis ma rig pa ni bas la/ bdag gis rig pa ni bsgrubs/ bdag gis zug rdzuni phyu ba/ bka ki sred pa ni zad/ bdag gis chos kyi gru ni sbya rang/ bdag gis
319b5(mdo): chos kyi rnga ni brdungs/ bdag gis chos kyi rung ni bus/ bdag gis/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng / bdag gis 'khor ba'i lugs ni zlog/ bdag gis chos kyi lugs ni bsnyad/ bdag gis lam ngan pa
319b6(mdo): ni bcad/ bdag gis lam ni yang dag par bstan pa/ bdag gis zhing ngan pa dag ni rnam par bzlog/ bdag gis bsod nams kyi zhing dag ni yang dag par bstan da// 'di ltar bdag gis byang chub
319b7(mdo): de ci sa khong du chung ba dang / gang gis 'ong du chud pa dang / sus khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i chos de la nges par brtag par bya ste/ ci sus kyi 'od du nung ngam/ 'od te sems kyi 'ong du chung / gal te lus kyi khong du chung ngu ni/
319b8(mdo): lus 'bebs po// g.yo ba myed pa/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong pa dang / myig gsor lta bu ste/ sems pa myed pa/ 'byung ba chen po bzhis kyu rang pa/ pha ma'i myi chang pa las 'byung ba/ myi rtag pa dang / rtag tu
319b9(mdo): bsku ba dang / bkru ba dang / mnye rkos pa/ 'jig pa dang / rnam par 'gyes pa dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can no// sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ gnas myed pa/ mtshan nyid
320a1(mdo): myed pa/ dngos po myed pa/ bla ga ba myed pa'o// byang chub ni mying tsam tha snyad tsam ste/ sgra skad myed pa/ dpyad du myed pa/ grub pa myed pa/ srub myed pa/ 'jug pa myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa gad
320a2(mdo): bar bya ba ma yin pa/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / kadags pa las yang dag par 'das pa/ khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma thos pa/ bye brag ma byed pa// gzhi
320a3(mdo): myed pa/ dmyigs pa myed pa/ rgyu ba myed pa/ spros pa myed pa/ 'jug pa myed pa/ brtag tu myed pa/ dpag tu myed pa/ bstand du myed pa/ sgra myed pa/ yi ge myed pa/ tshig gi lam myed pa'o// de ltar na/ su mngon
320a4(mdo): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba ni gang yin/ chos 'a de dag thams cad ni mying tsam/ btags pa tsam/ brda tsam/ tha snyad
320a5(mdo): tsam/ brtags pa/ yongs su brtags pa/ ma byung ba/ byung ba myed pa rdzas ma yid pa/ rdzas myed pa/ lend pa myed pa/ bstand tu myed pa/ ma/ don par chags pa myed pa yin te/ de la ni mngon par rdzogs pa
320a6(mdo): 'tshang rgya ba su yang myed/ cis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang myed/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ci yang myed/ rna ma pa gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba yang myed
320a7(mdo): de/ 'di la gang de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de'i phyir/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub ni 'gyur ba myed pa/ myi 'gyur ba/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o snyam mo/ de nas
320a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
320a9(mdo): thos ji ltar byang chub kyi srad du 'jug par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bcas dpa/ 'jam dpal byang chub de ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal
320b1(mdo): kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ji ltar rab tu btsal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ni khams gsum pa las/ yang dag par 'das pa/ tha snyad las/
320b2(mdo): yang dag par 'das pa/ yi ge'i sgra skad las yang dag par 'das pa/ sgra las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jug pa myed pa/ bzod pa nyid nas 'jug pa myed pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas a/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jug
320b3(mdo): pa las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal 'jug pa myed pa'i 'jug pa ni/ byang chub la 'jug pa'o// 'jam dpal dngos po myed pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'du
320b4(mdo): pa'o// 'jam dpal bla gab myed pa la 'jug pa'o na byang chub la 'a drug pa'o// 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad la mngon
320b5(mdo): bar zhen pa myed pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o// 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer myed pa la 'jug pa ni bya / chub la 'jug pa'o// 'jam dpal dor ba myed pa dang / gzhan/
320b6(mdo): ba myed pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o// 'dzad pa la tha dad pa ma ba dang tha dad pa myed pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o// 'jam dpal so so yang dag par rig pa'i myig g.yor dang brag/
320b7(mdo): cha dang / nam mkha' dang / chu zla dang / smyig rgya la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o// de nas lha'i bu zla ba dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid 'od gzer gyi 'od kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pal 'di skad ces smram
320b8(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i rtsom pa no tsaM/ gnas ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i rtsom pa ni snying rje chen po 'o// gnas
320b9(mdo): ni sems can no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis snying rje chen po ci bsdus/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni g.yo
321a1(mdo): myed pas bsdus so// spras pa 'jam dpal g.yo myed pa cis bsdus/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yo myed pa ni sems can thams cad la snyoms bI sems kyis
321a2(mdo): bsdus so// smras pa 'jam dpal sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems cis bsdus/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems mi tha dad /
321a3(mdo): pa ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa myed pa'i pyod pas bsdus so// spras pa 'jam dpal tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa myed pa'i spyod pa cis bsdus/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lho'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs/
321a4(mdo): kyi tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa myed ba'i spyod pa ni bsam ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bsdus so// spras pa 'jam dpal bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam bco'i phyir 'byung / spras pa lha'i bu byang chub
321a5(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa na bya/ nga chub kyi sems kyi phyir 'byung ngo po// smras pa 'jam dpal byang / chub kyi sems ci'i phyir byung / smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dang /
321a6(mdo): rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi phyir byung ngo // smras pa 'jam dpral pha rol tu phyind pa drug ci'i phyir/ byung / smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol
321a7(mdo): tu phyind pa drug po dag ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi phyir byung ngo // smras pa 'jam dpal thabs dang shes rab ci'i phyir byung / smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang shes rab ni bag yod pa'i
321a8(mdo): phyir byung / smras pa 'dzi dpal bag yod pa ci'i phyir byung / smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag yod pa ni legs par pyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi phyir byung ngo // smras pa 'jam dpal legs par spyod/
321a9(mdo): rdo pa gsum ci'i phyir byung / smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs pa spyod pa rnam pa gsum ni dge ba bcu 'i las kyi lam gyi phyir byung ngo // smras pa 'jam dpal dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ci'i phyirargyu/
321b1(mdo): smras pa lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi sam dag ni sdom pa'i phyir byung ngo // smras pa 'jam dpal sdom pa ci'i phyir byung / spras pa lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi sdom pa ma tshul bzhin yid
321b2(mdo): la byed pa'i phyir byung ngo // sbas pa 'jam dpal tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ci'i phyir byung / sbas pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin yid la bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i phyir byung ngo // spras pa 'jam da /
321b3(mdo): so sor rtog pa ci'i phyir byung / smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so sor rtog pa ni dran pa'i phyir byung ngo po/ smras pa 'jam dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dag rgyur bsdu ba dang 'dra/
321b4(mdo): bur bsdu ba 'gyur ba ru/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dag rgyur bsdu ba dang / 'bras bur bsdu bar 'gyur ba na bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ dngo pa sem
321b5(mdo): bskyed pa dang / spyod pa dang 'brel pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs po'o/ de la dang po sems bskyed pa ni ts+tsha/ da pa dang 'brel pa'i chur blta'o// spyod pa dang 'brel pa ni phyir skye
321b6(mdo): ldog pa'i rgyur blta'o// phyir myi ldog pa ni skye ba gcig gis thA gas pa'i rgyur blta'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang dper na/ sa bon btab pa de lta bur ni dang po'i sems bskyed pa blta'o// dper na
321b7(mdo): sa bon las zug gu mngon par 'grub pa de lta bur mi spyod pa dang 'brel ba'i sems bskyed pa blta'o// dper na sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung ba de lta bur ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/
321b8(mdo): dper na 'bras bu song su gyur pa des bu'i snrel gcig gis thogs pa'i sesas 'byed pa blta'o// spu'i bu ga' dri sa dper na shing sgyum byam shing rta bsdu bags pa de lta zlang dang ze'i mas bskyed pa pal 'o// dib sa/
321b9(mdo): gi rnaMm mam lan yongs su srung bzhi pa 'i ngas bur mi myong pa dang 'brel pa'i sems bskyed pa pasa'o// na ning na'i sen la na myong pa yong su shes pa lta zu ni phyi gyi ga pa'i sems pa gyid pa pas la/
322a1(mdo): ha~M/ khal dgal bshes pa de la bu ni lte ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o// gA'i bu gzhan yang tha ba' chos pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par grub pa de lta zur ni dang po'i sem sa la skyed pa lalnga'o/ sa
322a2(mdo): na tshes lnga dang drug dang / bdun kyi nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel ba'i sems bskyed pa blta'o// dper na tshes bcu'i nub mo'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de lta bur ni phyir mye ldog pa'i sa
322a3(mdo): bskyed pa la lta'o// dper na tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de blta bur ni skye ba cig gi lo kha'i sems bskyed pa blta'o// dper na chos bco lnga'i nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de lta bur ni de
322a4(mdo): gshegs pa'i ye shes su blta'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang sa s+ya bskyed pa dang po ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'da'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis bu ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o/ sems bskyed pa gsum
322a5(mdo): pa ni ma nges pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'o// sems bskyed/ pa bzhi pa ni nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan/ yang dang po'i sems bskyed pa ni yi ge'i phyi mo 'dzin pa'i tshul du lta
322a6(mdo): lo// dper na rnam par dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o// dper na grangs dang rtsis dang shod dgod pa shes pa de lta bur ni phyir myi ldog pa la sos
322a7(mdo): bskyed pa blta'o// dper na bstan chos rnams khong du chud pa shes pa de lta bu ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyur 'brel pa'o// sems bskyed pa ga
322a8(mdo): pa ni ye shes dang 'brel pa'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong ba dang 'brel pa'o/ sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po na rgyus bsdus pa'o// sems
322a9(mdo): bskyed pa gnyis pa ni ye shes kyis bsdus pa'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong bas bsdus pa'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bus bsdus pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyu
322b1(mdo): yang dag par byung ba'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni ye shes las yang dag par byung ba'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong ba las yang dag par byung ba'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bu las yang dag par byung ba'o//
322b2(mdo): lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni mu rab tu 'byed pa'i yan lag go// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni ye shes rab du dbye ba'i yan lag go// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong ba rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go/ sems skyed pa
322b3(mdo): bzhi pa ni 'bras bu rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go// lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni sman bsdu ba'i tshul du blta'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni sman rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa'i tshul tu blta'o// mas
322b4(mdo): bskyed pa gsum pa ni sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa'i tshul du blta'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni nad pa gsol ba la mkhas pa'i tshul du blta'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs
322b5(mdo): kyi rgyun tu 'byung ba'i tshul du blta'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud kyi bslab pa yang dag par 'a/ ji nad pa'i tshul du blta'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni chos kyi/
322b6(mdo): rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud kyi bslab pa tshar phyin pa'i tshul du bltasems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs kyi bslab pa la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du blta'o// de nas lho'i bu 'od rnam par
322b7(mdo): nges pa'i 'od gzer gyi 'od kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam gang dang ldan na/ mu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
322b8(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mdor bsdus pa gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mdor pa ni gnyis te/ byang chub seMs
322b9(mdo): dpa' dag lam 'di gnyis dang ldan na/ myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gnyis kang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thabs dang shes rab bo// de la thabs ni bsdu ba shes pa'o/
323a1(mdo): shes rab ni yongs su gcod pa' shes pa'o// thabs ni sems can la blta ba'o// shes rab ni chos thams cad la myi blta' ba'o// thabs ni chos la sbyor ba shes pa'o// shes rab ni bral ba shes pa'o// thabs ni rgyal/
323a2(mdo): dmyigs pa shes pa'o// shes rab ni rgyu zad par 'gro ba'o// thabs ni chos tha dad pa shes pa'o// shes rab ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed pa shes po thabs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan shes pa'o// shes rab ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
323a3(mdo): mnyam pa nyid dbyer myed par shes pa'o// thabs ni sems can gi dbang po dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa'o// shes rab ni sems can dmyigs su myed par shes pa'o// thabs ni byang chub kyi rkyen thob par byed par shes so//
323a4(mdo): shes rab ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa shes pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ tshogs kyi lam dang / yongs su gcod
323a5(mdo): ba li lam mo// de la tshogs kyi lam ni pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po// dag go// yongs su gcod pa'i lamaM ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu byaM/ nad pa'o// gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te/ gnyis
323a6(mdo): gang zhe na/ chags pa dang bcas pa'i lam dang / chags pa myed pa li lam mo// de la chags pa dang bcas pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po dag go// chags pa myed pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
323a7(mdo): ba'o// gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam dang / zag pa myed pa'i lam mo// de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po dag go// zag pa myed
323a8(mdo): pa'i lam ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'o// gzhan yang mdor sus pa'i las gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhem/ tshad yod par bya ba'i lam dang / tshad myed par byas pa'i lam so// de la tshad song bar bya ba'i la ma 'imangam
323a9(mdo): ma'i gnas so// tshad myed par bya ba'i lam ni mtshan ma myed pa'i gnas so// gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ shes pa'i lam dang / spong ba'i lam mo// de la shes pa'i lam ni sa dang po nas
323b1(mdo): bzung ste/ sa bdun pa'i bar du'o// spong ba'i lam yis brgyang pa nas bzung ste/ sa bcu pa'i bar du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sgrub pa dpa' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ce/
323b2(mdo): smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na don gyis rab tu phye ba yin/ ji ltar na ye shes kyis rab du phye ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu don ni ldan pa myed pa'o//
323b3(mdo): ye shes ni ldan pa'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir don ni ldan pa myed la/ ye shes ni ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu don ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ chos gang dang yang ldan pa 'am myi ldan pa ma /
323b4(mdo): bar khong du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don ni 'gyur ba myed pa'i mtshan nyid yin te/ de ni chos gang dang ldan pa 'am myi ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o// don ni bzod ma nas yongs su grub pa myed pa'i phyir chos
323b5(mdo): gang dang yang ldan pa 'am myi ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud par bya/ 'o// don ni dor ba myed pa dang / gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir chos kang dang // yang ldan pa 'am myi ldan par ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o//
323b6(mdo): yi ge zhes bya ba ni lam ste/ lam ni sems dang yang dag par wA/ na ba yin gyi/ myi ldan pa ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ye shes na ldan pa zhes bya ste/ myi ldan pa ma yin no// ye shes ni spong ba dang /
323b7(mdo): yang dag par ldan pa yin gyi myi ldan pa la ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste/ myi ldan pa ma yin no// ye shes zhes bya ba ni phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa
323b8(mdo): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste// gyi ldan bra ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rgya
323b9(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rnam pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes pa dang / don shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / bsdu
324a1(mdo): bshes pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa shes pa dang / snying rje chen po shes pa dang / sems yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa myed par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
324a2(mdo): rnam pa de bcu ni byang chub seMs dang sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshim pa rnam pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ seMs
324a3(mdo): can thams cad kyi lus kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir lus kyi chom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngag gi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir ngag gi chom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi lam yongs su sbyad
324a4(mdo): ba'i phyir sems kyi com pa dang / sems can thams cad la mngon par zhe nad pa myed par bya ba'i phyir nang ga rtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor bar bya ba phyir phyi'i rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongasu
324a5(mdo): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing / thams cad kyi yon tan gyi bkod pa kun tu bstan pa'i phyir zhing gi rtsom/ ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi sman yongs su shes pa ru bya ba'i phyir
324a6(mdo): sems can yongs su sbyin pa bya ba'i chom pa dang / nges pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de kho na'i chom pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad la sems mngon par zhen pa myed par bya ba'i phyir/
324a7(mdo): 'dus ma byas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rtsom pa ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa 'di bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chom pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses
324a8(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyor ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa'i sbyor ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi sbyor ba dang / thabs kyi sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba dang / bsod
324a9(mdo): nams kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang / ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba'i sbyor ba dang / bde ba rnam par dpyad pa'i sbyor ba dang / sdug pa dang myi sdug pa thams cad la ma/
324b1(mdo): bar dga' ba myed pa'i sbyor ba ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyor ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myi zad pa la rtog pa bcu
324b2(mdo): bcu ga pazhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / dngos po mya zad pa la rtog pa dang / chos myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / sred pa myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / lta ba myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / tshogs myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / nye
324b3(mdo): bar lend pa myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / mngon par zhen pa myed pa myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / 'du ba myi zad pa la rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po myi zad pa la rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
324b4(mdo): chen po rnams kyi myi zad pa la rtog pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dngos po bcu po ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gtong ba'i char rab tu
324b5(mdo): 'bebs pas ser sna'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang / las rnam pa gsum yongs su sbyong bas/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems 'a/ dul po nyid dang / byams pa sgoms pas khong khro ba'i sems 'dul
324b6(mdo): pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la myi skyo bas le lo'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang / bsam gtan dang rnam bar tha rad pa rnam par 'phrul bas myi dge ba'i sems 'dul ba nyid
324b7(mdo): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas gtan la/ 'bebs pa la mkhas pa'i tshogs bsags pas// myi shes pa'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang / lam gyi tshogs bskyed pas/ nyon mongs pa 'dul ba nyid dang / phyin tsam ldog
324b8(mdo): pa'i lam bskyed pas bden pa'i tshogs bsogs pas 'dul ba nyid dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa dbang sgyur bas sems 'dul ba nyid dang / bdag myed pa'i chos la rtog pas bdag 'dul ba nyid de/ rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag
324b9(mdo): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dngos po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dul ba las ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
325a1(mdo): lus kyi las kyi dge ba rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bas lus dul ba nyid dang / ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi yongs su sbyong bas ngag dul ba nyid dang / yid kyi nges pa pyod pa rnam pa gsum yongs su sbyor bas ses
325a2(mdo): dul ba nyid dang / rang gi lus la mngon par zhend pa myed pa'i tshul gyis nang rul ba nyid dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa myed pa'i dus kyis phyi ros kyi yul dul ba nyid dang / lam la mngon por chen
325a3(mdo): myed pa'i tshul gyis ye shes kyi tshogs la mngon par zhend pa myed pa dul ba nyid dang / 'phags pa'i sa'i ngo bo nyid la rtog pa'i tshul gyis bdag la stod pa dul ba nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa'i tshul /
325a4(mdo): phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa yongs su sbyong ba dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad la myi slu ba'i tshul gyis tha snyad shi nad tu yongs su dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyind par byed pa'i snying rje chen po
325a5(mdo): tshul gyis lus dang sems la myi lta ba dul ba nyid de/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dul ba'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
325a6(mdo): ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yin te/ log par sgrub pa snying por byed pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// de la sgrub pa snying por byed pa ni ji skad smras pa/
325a7(mdo): de bzhin du byed pa yin no// log par sgrub pa snying por byed pa ni tshig gi dngos po kho na'o// de ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa mang ba yin gyi/ log par sgrub pa snying por byed pa mang ba ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan
325a8(mdo): gnyis po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lam sgrub pa dang / spong ba sgrub pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal sas
325a9(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsgrub pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gdul ba'i sgrub pa dang / sems can yongs su
325b1(mdo): sbyin par bya ba'i sgrub pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te/ gnyis
325b2(mdo): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i shes pas sgrub pa dang / lhund kyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi sgrub pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub po'o// rigs
325b3(mdo): kyi gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa bsgrub pa dang / sa dbyer myed pa la mkhas par bsgrub pa ste/
325b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te// gnyis
325b5(mdo): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i nyes pa rnam par spong ba'i sgrub pa/ dang / sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ ba bsgrub pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag na byang chub seM sa
325b6(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos
325b7(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgrub pa'i bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa la mkhas pa'i bsgrub pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
325b8(mdo): kyi sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa na 'di lta bu 'di dag ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'bad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
325b9(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsgrub pa rnams la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' ba ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la bka' stsald pa/ 'jam
326a1(mdo): na / dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par bshad pa legs so// legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
326a2(mdo): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha dang / mr-i dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
326a3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa ga ya 'go'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen
326a4(mdo): po'i mdo/ rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo de dang / zhu
326a5(mdo): chen gyi lo tsha ba ba na de ye shes sdes skyur da cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/
326a6(mdo): dang zhus te dag
